“It did. She’s pretty much my best friend now.” You nodded. “But as for past events…uh…I’ll start off with a simple one. When I was in tenth grade, I won an award for math score achievements, but Tracy lost out to one of her classmates to win her own award. As such, her persecution complex convinced her that I was to blame for her missing out on an award, and that meant she felt compelled to bully me.

“She took an interesting approach though. Grabbing me up when my mom wasn’t looking, Tracy smushed me up into a blob, and then dripped some lemon juice from our kitchen onto me. Popping me into her mouth before heading out to catch the bus, Tracy proceeded to use me as her gum for the entire day. It was a blur of crushing, smashing, and gnashing for hours on end.

“Unfortunately, it didn’t take Tracy long to realize the cruel genius of her plan. Because tiny guys like me are much more absorbent when squished, my body totally soaked in the lemon juice, thus retaining its taste and flavor through the whole day. And…uh…the next day. And the next. Tracy used me as her gum for five straight days, smiling the whole time at how tasty I was to her. It only ended when she slipped up by mentioning me on the phone with her friend when my mom was in earshot.”

Sensing your story was finished, Quinn winced. “Gum? That’s awful, Hunter. How could Tracy treat you like that, her own brother?”

You forced a laugh. “Well, it was hardly the worst thing she ever did to me. Not even close.” Quinn’s eyes narrowed tensely, and you backtracked. “I-I mean, she didn’t get off scot-free. My mom forced her to scrub the bathroom with a toothbrush every night for a week, which caused her to have to cancel a party she was planning on going to.” You paused, and frowned. “Of course, my mom also punished me for missing class, even though it was Tracy’s fault. And, Tracy saw her own punishment as my fault, so she had it out for me the next few weeks too.”

“That’s nuts.” Quinn shook her head.

“You’ve got that right.” You stated. “The cycle of bullying and punishment was and endless dance between Tracy, my mom, and I.” You rubbed your chin. “But, I don’t want you to think we were an awful family either, Quinn. For all the bad memories, there were plenty of times where my family and I all got along great. I’ve got a bunch of treasured memories somewhere in my ol’ noggin!”

Quinn smirked again. “What, like vacations and trips? Stuff like that?”

Your demeanor faded just a bit. “Uh, not always. I meant hanging out at home, or things like that. Not to say our family vacations and trips weren’t great, but…let’s just say the risk of danger to someone like me was increased by about a thousand during those times.”

Quinn’s eyed widened. “Oh, shit, really? I guess that makes sense.”

You glanced over at Quinn’s clock on the wall, seeing that there was still plenty of time left in the day. “Well, I’ll stop beating around the bush. Guess I can tell you a more specific, longer story.”
11421.title: Familial Issues

choices: Helen leaves you in her hotel room to fend for yourself all weekend.
Helen molds you into clothing to wear, so you can always be close all weekend.
*Writer's Choice*
114213.content:
Realizing that it would be a fairly unique tale to tell your new friend, you proposed the idea. “Well, I actually could tell about this one time where I accidentally ended up tagging along with my mom on one of her business trips.” You said.

“Accidentally? How’d that play out?” Quinn inquired.

You chuckled lightly. “About as well as you might imagine. Basically…”

(FLASHBACK BEGIN)

It had been pretty much just a normal week of July, of which you’d spent most of that time trying (and frequently failing) to avoid Tracy, and catching up on TV shows you’d missed during the school year. It was the summer between your ninth and tenth grade. Just a day prior, your mother had revealed she was leaving on another sudden business trip, lasting from Friday to Sunday. She’d informed your younger sister that she was in charge of keeping you safe.

Tracy didn’t take that too well.

“But MOM!” Tracy whined, stomping her foot once for emphasis. “I was gonna hang out with Lindsey all weekend! We’ve had these plans for over a month!”

Your mom shrugged. “I’m sorry, sweetie, but this is how it is with my job. As a consultant, I always have to be on call at any moment. I’ll make it up to you when I get back.”

Your sister sneered. “But why can’t Hunter just hang out by himself all weekend? He’s practically an adult.”

Helen patted her daughter on the shoulder. “And he’s also an inch tall. All it would take is one tiny accident without your supervision, and we could lose him. You need to stay home and look after him. Don’t baby him, but check in on him at least a few times a day.” She paused. “Speaking of, he’s still asleep, isn’t he?”

Without faltering a beat, Tracy nodded. “Yeah, I think. Haven’t seen him all day.”

Your mother sighed. “Oh well. Tell him I say goodbye. I’m going to run to the bathroom once more, and then I’m off.” She turned from Tracy and gestured to her already packed suitcase. “Could you make sure each pocket is zipped up nice and tight?”
Tracy groaned, but nodded. “Sure, mom.”

Helen wandered off to the bedroom, and Tracy waited until she heard the door shut before swearing under her breath. Angrily, she tore off the hairtie she’d been wearing, which of course was actually your squished, molded body. Glaring at your flattened form, your giantess sister frowned…until her expression morphed into one of inspiration, her eyes darting back and forth between you and Helen’s suitcase.

Finally, Tracy grinned, and leaned over you. “Ya know what, Hunter? I’m not putting my plans on hold just to look after you all weekend. Why don’t you take a nice little trip instead?” Tracy smirked, and mimed blowing you a kiss before angling her palm and letting your papery body roll off her hand and into the main pouch of the suitcase. You couldn’t do a thing to slow your descent, and merely glimpsed a final sight of your sister’s mean-spirited grin before everything became darkness as she zipped up the suitcase.

You reformed fairly quickly, but not enough to do anything about the fate Tracy had bestowed upon you. As your mother returned from the bathroom and grabbed her suitcase to begin rolling it, you toppled over, falling deeper into the piles of clothes all around you. Slipping deeper into the suitcase, your attempts at crying out to get her attention were useless, as your voice was nowhere near loud enough to penetrate outside the mound of clothes and the walls of the suitcase.

Hugging Tracy goodbye, Helen strolled out to her car, tossing the suitcase into the backseat before driving off. The simple act of tossing her suitcase into the car caused all her clothes inside to bounce around wildly, and your miniscule body was tossed around like a toy, banging into the sides of the suitcase and ending up buried under even more clothes. Your body was squished slightly, but at least the soft fabrics surrounded you comforted your experience somewhat.

This was not to say that you felt mentally comfortable at all. Because of Tracy’s grudge against you, and her general selfishness, you were now ripped from your relaxing home and helplessly being taken along on your mother’s business trip. You had no idea where Helen was heading, how long it would take for her to get there, or if she’d even find you once there. On top of that, you were already fearing whatever punishment Helen would dole out, as you knew from experiencing that her “strict but fair” nature would take no mercy on you.

For the moment, though, there was nothing you could do but wait. Straining your ears to hear, you could just barely make out the sounds of a typical airport, and from the shaking of your suitcase prison, you knew your mom had just checked in her baggage. Everything around you fell sideways, crushing you more in the shift of the clothes pile, and you guessed you were now on the luggage conveyor belt rumbling along to the plane.

The next few hours were a blur of noises, motion, and unsettling silence. Your suitcase was eventually loaded onto the plane, tossed inside and stacked. It took over an hour for the plane to board and take off, and then the actual plane flight was a few hours at least. You didn’t know for sure, because you eventually drifted off to sleep (having given up on trying to reform with the weight of the clothes crushing you down), and you regained consciousness right around the time your mom made it to her hotel.

You began mentally bracing yourself as Helen rolled the suitcase towards the elevator and up to her room. You needed to prepare to reform and get her attention, lest your situation spiral into even further chaos than it was already shaping up to be. You took a deep breath, and finally felt the entire suitcase shake and tilt as your mom laid it out on her hotel bed, and began to unzip the central pouch.

Traces of light shone down from the room into the deepest crevices of the suitcase, where you were currently located. You could hear your mom softly mumbling to herself as she systematically removed one item from her suitcase after another, no doubt taking mental inventory. Craning your head back, you could see some of the clothing around you, which consisted of multiple business blouses and skirts, an alluring formal dress, and a surprisingly revealing one-piece bikini. You tried to ignore the frilly panties and bras you could feel touching you from all sides.

At long last, your mom retrieved the pair of panties covering you up, revealing you to the world and momentarily blinding you from the light. Having managed to reform, you blinked rapidly to clear your sight, and soon found yourself staring up at your mother’s giant face. She was peering down at you quizzically, which then morphed into surprise, and finally landed on annoyance.

“…what are you doing in here, Hunter?” Helen asked, flatly.

You winced. “U-uh…just hanging out, mom. It was…um…comfy?”

Your mom wasn’t amused by your attempt to lighten the mood, and she pinched your chest and lifted you out of her suitcase. “So…you thought my lingerie was comfortable? Is that what you’re trying to say, Hunter?”

Your face flushed. “N-no, no! I was just–”

Helen sighed. “Trying to lighten the mood, right? Let me guess…Tracy threw you in here to avoid looking after you all weekend. That sound correct?”

Your eyes widened. “Yeah, pretty much.”

Your mother dropped you onto the desk beside the room’s TV and ran her hands through her hair. “That girl is grounded for a month when I get back. I really don’t have time to look after you this weekend. I have a meeting tonight with some company managers, and then I’m spending all day tomorrow with our client. Some rich heiress wants a sponsorship with our company, and I have to liaison with her.”

You blinked dumbly, having only caught some of what your mom had just said. Reading your blank expression, Helen groaned. “Oh, Hunter…I’m saying that I’m too busy to keep a close eye on you. It just can’t happen…” She paused, and sat back on her bed. “Well, I suppose that I could…hmm.”

“If I can do anything to help, I will!” You offered enthusiastically, earning an eye roll from your mother.

“You just want out of punishment, don’t you?” Helen inferred. “Still, I guess I DO have a few options as for what to do with you. Hmm.” Your mom rubbed her chin while staring intently at you, and you felt a small shiver go down your spine. Something about the look in her eyes, while kind and caring and loving, had the same hint of danger you sensed from Tracy frequently.

You had the sinking feeling you weren’t getting out of your mom’s business trip unscathed.

(FLASHBACK CONTINUES)
114213.title: Important Business to Attend To

choices: You tell Quinn about a time where Tracy used Norah to torment you.
You tell Quinn about a time home alone with just you and Norah.
You tell Quinn about one of the jobs that Norah roped you into.
11422.content:
“So, I’m just really curious about this Norah person.” Quinn said, finally deciding on a conversation topic. “Like, I get that she’s your aunt, but you’re being a little cagey about what it was like to actually be around her. Seems like it might’ve been a mix of good and bad, huh?”

You laughed shortly. “Yeah, you kind of hit the nail on the head, Quinn. Aunt Norah was really a handful. It’s been about a year now since I’ve last seen her. The last time was when she came over for a surprise visit during Christmas time, and stayed a week. I spent Christmas day sloshing away in her stomach after she swallowed me with her eggnog, and that was hardly the only incident that week.”

“Oh, yikes.” Quinn’s eyes widened. “You did mention she was pretty airheaded, didn’t you?”

“I was putting it lightly, for her sake.” You groaned. “Norah’s a total scatterbrain. I’ll be sitting on the couch, she’ll see me and say hello, turn around and notice her favorite show is on, and then sit down to watch it for three hours…right on top of me! Even then, I’m lucky if she realizes what she’s done when she finally does stand up, or if I’m glued to her butt for the foreseeable future.” You gave Quinn a sidelong look. “And of course, if we’re talking six or more years ago, Tracy would’ve let it all happen with a quiet smirk.”

Quinn tapped her chin thoughtfully. “Norah and your sister put you through the ringer, huh? Gotta say, it’s impressive you survived through it all.”

You nodded. “Guess you could say I learned from every experience. Certainly there are some experiences that I wish I could burn from my brain, though.” You forced out a laugh. “In my worst nightmares, I can still remember Norah believing Tracy back in middle school, when she squished up my body and said I was a ‘new, special toe cleaner’. Norah used me to pick out lint and toe jam from her disgusting feet for a week…before throwing me in the trash where I barely escaped before being taken out to the curb.”

Quinn gaped, but said nothing for a moment. Finally, she frowned. “And can you tell me more about that…tiny recruiter…thing? Her job, right?”

“Yeah, and it was a cushy one that let her mostly work from home.” You explained. “Basically, Norah was assigned a sheet of tiny-specific job postings, and then needed to recruit tinies to fill the spots as quickly as possible. It wasn’t too hard for her. Tiny-exclusive jobs pay really well, usually because of the danger involved, and Norah’s exuberance was hard to turn down. She’s also…and I mean this from a purely factual standpoint, not anything weird…really attractive given her age. Most tinies would fall head over heels to make her happy by saying yes.

“The trouble was, given her penchant for being forgetful and oblivious, Norah would almost never explain the jobs clearly or fully. She probably just didn’t get how awful some tasks could be when you’re just one inch. She’d also overestimate herself sometimes, and come up short with approaching deadlines. That’s where she’d come and rope me into a job, promising double pay and that they would only be for a week or so.” You paused. “However, one week of serving as a head executive’s ‘stress toy’ felt like an eternity when I did it.”

This last statement drew ire from Quinn, and a flash of anger danced in her eyes. “One of her recruiting jobs was to sell yourself as a stress toy?” The black-haired giantess asked moodily.

“Yep. And there were plenty that were so much worse. Again, Norah was kind of too dumb to realize what she was coercing so many tinies into, so I can’t be too mad at her specifically. Those are still some bad memories of mine.” You stopped for a second and then smiled wistfully. “That sums up Norah, actually. A decent bit of good wrapped up in a whole lot of bad. Add in Tracy during her torment years, and you’ve hit peak awful.” You chuckled.

Quinn shook her head, overwhelmed by the sheer craziness of your life. Even still, you could see the intrigue dancing in her eyes now that her anger had cooled, and sure enough, a minute later, she was ready to hear some more specific stories.
11422.title: The Sister and the Aunt

choices: Continue
114221.content:
Wanting to keep up this pace, you jumped right into your next offer. “I’ve got a story about Tracy and Norah, if you’re interested.” You explained. “It just came to me.”

Quinn leaned back in her chair and folded her arms in front of her prodigious chest. “Sure, go ahead.”

“Alright.” You rubbed your hands together. “It’s nothing too crazy. Basically…”

(FLASHBACK BEGIN)

It was the summer between tenth and eleventh grade, in the middle of blistering August. By this point of the summer, you’d finished all of your preparatory assigned work for the upcoming school year, so you were totally free for the remaining ten days of your break. As such, you spent most of your time sprawled out on the couch lazily watching TV. It was easy living, perhaps a bit boring, but definitely relaxing.

On this particular day, you’d made sure to avoid the havoc hurricane that was Aunt Norah. She’d arrived the day prior, showing up minutes before your mom headed out on another of her seemingly endless business trips. Norah hadn’t been in the house for more than five minutes before she’d plopped her gargantuan buttocks onto your tiny body, not noticing you on the chair she’d claimed as her own. Of course, Tracy had let her sit there for over an hour before letting slip your whereabouts.

Norah had given her trademark quick apology, laughing as she did so, and though you knew she meant well, you knew it was safer for you to just distance yourself from her as much as possible. This morning she was sequestered away in a side room, probably in the middle of one of her daily yoga sessions. She hadn’t crushed or smushed you yet, and you were determined to keep it that way by maintaining a healthy distance from your airheaded aunt, all day if need be.

A few minutes later, your younger sister walking by, sparing a quick sidelong glance at you before she approached the room Norah was in. Opening the door, Tracy was hit by an overwhelming wave of heat, and she gasped for breath. Even from across the room on the couch, you could feel the hot temperatures of the room hit your face, and could hardly imagine what Norah was doing in there.

Thankfully, Tracy spoke for you, poking her head into the room. “Aunt Norah, what are you doing? Why is it so freakin’ hot in here?” Tracy laughed. “You’re sweating up a storm!”

Norah’s hearty laugh floated all the way from the room to your ears. “Oh, good morning, Tracy, dear! I wanted to switch up my morning yoga by trying out something I saw online. It’s called hot yoga, I think. The point is to work up a crazy sweat.”
Tracy wrinkled up her nose. “Really? That seems kinda gross.”

Norah laughed again; her voice tinged with a hint of exhaustion. “It is, but it truly does feel good to get it all out, you know? It’s why I closed all the windows in this room, turned off the AC, and brought in that heater in the corner. The hotter the better…or so I read.”

“I mean, you do you, Aunt Norah.” Tracy giggled, moving to step back and close the door.

“Oh wait!” Norah called out. “If you could do one quick thing for me, dear? I forgot a sweat rag, and I sure as heck will need one by the time I’m down. Preferably sooner. Could you get one for me?”

Tracy nodded, not at all surprised her scatterbrained aunt would forget something so crucial for morning exercise. “Sure thing, I’ll be right back.”

“You’re an angel, Tracy!” Were Norah’s last words before Tracy closed the door and walked back towards you, moving to pass through the living room and towards the bathroom to procure a washcloth.

On her way, she glanced over at you again, and stopped in her tracks. Your younger sister paused while staring at you, frowning. An expression danced in her eyes, one of curiosity and inquisitiveness, a look which you failed to notice as you’d gone back to happily watching TV. You didn’t so much as glance the huge grin which began to grow on Tracy’s face, nor the malicious glint in her eyes as she sauntered over to you.

It was only when Tracy was directly beside you, towering above you that you noticed her. Taking your eyes off the TV, you craned your neck all the way back to peer up at your giantess sister, her smirk on full display. Feeling incredibly uneasy, you tried to play it cool and hopefully diffuse any situation that may be brewing. You had no idea what her plans were.

“Uh…hey, Tracy.” You said, as casually as possible, though your voice still wavered. Tracy grinned wider, seemingly pleased that you were so on-edge around her.

“What’s up, Hunter? Finished all your schoolwork for the first day of class in a week and a half?” Tracy asked, almost friendly, though her unsettling grin remained.

You gulped. “Y-yeah…”

“Great! Doing anything today?” Tracy put her hands on her hips and leaned just a little closer to you. You subconsciously drew into yourself a bit.

“…no?”

Tracy clapped her hands together. “Awesome! Then you’ll be perfect for this!” Your younger sister clapped again…although this time, it consisted of her slapping her palms down onto the couch, and crushing you flat.
114221.title: Helping Norah Stay Clean (Part One)

choices: You have more stories of Tracy getting Norah to torment you.
*Writer's Choice*
*Writer's Choice*
1142211.content:
Peeling your squished form off of the couch, Tracy effortlessly picked your clothes off with her fingernail and flicked the remnants of fabric scraps into the trash can. With you naked, she was easily able to stretch and mold your body, contorting your malleable form into a roughly rectangular shape about a foot long. She then used her thumb to press into your face and harshly smear your facial features into an unrecognizable blob, your vision blurring as she did so, and your mouth morphing into a useless lump.

Satisfied, Tracy strolled back over to Norah’s exercise room, opened the door, and held you out like she was presenting a gift. “Got you that sweat rag, Aunt Norah! Sorry it took me a minute.”

“Ah, it’s no problem at all, dear. You’re so nice, Tracy.” Norah gushed, stepping off her yoga mat to grab you. As soon as she approached, you could see the blurry image of her smile warmly at your sister, and not even spare you a second glance as she grabbed you with her slimy hand and clenched you tightly. Only Tracy glanced at you for a lightning quick second, smirking as she did so.

Norah threw you over her shoulder as she returned to the center of the room. Looking over her shoulder at Tracy, she cocked her head quizzically to the side. “This sweat rag feels quite odd, don’t you think?”

Tracy, ever quick on her feet, smile easily. “Oh, I think it’s one of my mom’s specially ordered rags. Supposed to be comfy but also super absorbent? I think that’s what it is, I grabbed it from a stack in the bathroom.” The lie came out smoothly, and Norah nodded innocently.

“Is that right?” Your aunt chuckled. “I’ll put it to the test, then!”

Tracy grinned, half genuinely and half maliciously. Her plan would’ve been ruined if Norah had called her out on the lie, as excellent as it was. Thankfully for Tracy, her plan was flawless. “I’ll leave you to it!” Your cruel sister giggled, then excused herself, closing the door behind her.

Norah went back to some simple stretches, leaving you lying over her shoulder. The tiny, cramped room was unbelievably hot, the unbearable temperatures nearly searing. You were sweating buckets in seconds, as was your aunt, and Norah’s sweat mixed with your own to create a fearsome bog of disgusting stench. You fought to squirm to alert Norah, but you were too thoroughly crushed by Tracy to move. Similarly, you found reforming equally challenging, and you were still a flat, vaguely washcloth shape five minutes later, when…

“Oh, goodness. That was very exhausting!” Norah sighed aloud, as she reached for you. Your blood ran cold as her hot fingers touched your body and dragged you off her shoulder. You gave one last, futile attempt to wiggle, but it was no use. All you could do in those last moments was look through smeared eyes at your curvaceous giantess aunt, who was clad in a tight sports bra and form-fitting compression shorts.

Seconds later, Norah slammed you into her taut abdomen, pressing you firmly into her sweat-slicked skin. You winced from the impact, and double-so once your titanic aunt began scraping you up and down her tummy, using your absorbent body to gather up every remaining bit of sweat from her. You wished you could stop it, but your body’s natural processes greedily sucked up all of Norah’s sweat like a good little sweat rag.

Impressed at the ‘specially ordered rag’ Tracy had given her, Norah smiled appreciatively as she continued to rub you all over her body. She wedged you down her cleavage, rummaging you around her sizable tits until you’d sopped up all their collected sweat. Norah then dragged you up and down her toned legs, going so far as to clean between her toes and under her soles with your face, forcing you to taste every inch of her dirty and sweaty body.

Last of all, Norah smiled sheepishly, silently glad that Tracy was in the other room, and stripped out of her compression shorts. It took her a minute to wiggle the skintight shorts off of her booty, but she finally did so, filling the room with an extra pungent odor. Mentally screaming at your aunt, begging her to stop, you braced for impact as Norah slammed your beaten, abused body into her tight butt cheeks (as she had been wearing nothing underneath her shorts).

Scrubbing you dutifully into her cheeks, Norah decimated your body with sweat and stench in equal measure. She rubbed you in methodical circles around her plump cheeks, humming a little tune as she did so. Your body contorted and squished as she did so, amazing Norah even further. She couldn’t believe that this new sweat rag could be stretched into whatever shape best cleaned her at any given moment.

Wanting to test this great new sweat rag to its limits, Norah twisted your head and your feet, pulling you taut into a skinnier, lengthier rope-like form. This caught you off guard, until you were hit with an earth-shattering realization, and your world crashed down around you. You fought with every fiber of your being to stop your oblivious aunt, but it was no use at all.

Wielding you like string, Norah proceeded to wedge your body into her sweltering, sweat coated butt crack. Using you like you were nothing more than floss, Norah dragged you up and down the inside of her crack, forcing you deeper into her as she did so. Blushing at the pleasantly ticklish sensation, Norah was none-the-wiser to what she was truly doing as she forced her tiny nephew deep into her meaty ass, forcing your body to soak up every last drop of gross sweat.

When she was finally done, Norah retrieved you from the depths of darkness, and daintily held you by two pinched fingers. You were soaked to the point of dripping with Norah’s sweat, your body caked with stench and dirt. You were barely hanging on mentally, fighting the urge to pass out. Through your one barely visible eye you glanced at your aunt, begging her to see you. Instead, she merely crinkled her nose and chuckled.

“I did quite a number on you, huh? Goodness!” Norah smiled. “Still, what an amazing rag! I’ll have to use you again sometime!”
Without another thought, Norah dropped you onto the floor on top of her previously discarded compression shorts. Seconds later, she unhooked her well-worn sports bra and dropped it down over you, squishing you out of sight. A minute later you felt a sense of weightlessness as Norah hefted you and her gross clothes off the ground, and she sauntered out of the room.

Tracy, watching TV in the same spot you’d been, gaped at her aunt as she left the room. “Aunt Norah! What if Hunter was out here?” Your sister cried with surprise, gesturing to your aunt’s totally naked form.

Norah blinked in confusion, and then gasped. “My goodness, that totally slipped my mind! I’m sorry.” She blushed in embarrassment. “Where is Hunter, if I may ask? Haven’t seen him today.”

Your sister swore under her breath, not meaning to bring you up. “He’s…uh…still asleep, I think. I haven’t seen him today either.”
Norah puzzled this over in her mind for half a second before nodding, satisfied. “Okay. After I shower, we can just have an aunt and niece day! We’ll let Hunter sleep.”

“Sounds amazing, Aunt Norah.” Tracy grinned. She then leaned forward eagerly. “How was that special little rag?”

“A blessing!” Norah sighed with delight. “Never used such a great rag in my life. I’m throwing it in the wash now with my clothes. If you’ll let me, I’d love to use it more this week.”

Tracy nodded enthusiastically. “Of course. Put that silly thing through as much as you want to. It is its purpose, after all.”

A normal person might’ve been confused by your sister’s confusingly specific wording, but Norah merely chuckled and shuffled off to the laundry room. Not wasting a second, she tossed you and her workout clothes into the washer, poured in detergent, and went to take her well-deserved shower.

(FLASHBACK END)

You grimaced. “Norah held true to her hopes. After the wash cycle, I was still the exact same rag-shape, just sparkly clean. Tracy found me first, gloated about how good of a rag I was, then kept me pinned under a box all night so I couldn’t reform. Norah used me just as horribly the next morning, and then for every morning after that. Five straight days of wiping her whole body clean of sweat and grime.”

Quinn, enraptured, was practically whispering. “H-how did you finally stop it all?”

You managed a small smile. “I actually managed to, just barely, wiggle myself partially out from under Tracy’s box the final night. Because of that, I could reform my arm. When Norah went to use me the next morning, I waved frantically to her, she noticed, and then that was it. She let me reform, apologized for what she’d unknowingly done, and treated me to ice cream that night. It worked out in the end, I guess.”

Your black-haired roommate ran her hand through her hair. “Wow, dude. That’s pretty crazy. You have HOW many stories just like this one?”

“Hundreds.” You admitted. “Speaking of which…”
1142211.title: Helping Norah Stay Clean (Part Two)

choices: Five Long Days Later
For better or for worse, Tracy somehow interrupts your torment.
11422113.content:
"...That story isn't even over yet!"

Quinn's mouth hung open as she couldn't believe this awful tale could somehow keep going. Consumed with curiosity, your giantess roommate's expression alone urged you to continue.

"You see, I actually made a sincere mistake by being a little too relaxed after the fact..."

(Flashback Continued)

After resting in your room and getting your first good night's sleep not consumed entirely by struggling to reform form under the weight of Tracy's box, that evening Norah had prepared you a nice tiny cup of ice cream as a sort of apology. Or so you had thought it was for an apology...

Knocking on your door, your aunt soon let herself in, shot glass of frozen dairy in one hand and a well sized bowl in her other. "Hey Hunter, you doing okay?" Norah spoke into the room aimlessly not having spotted you yet. You felt familiar light tremors as she made her way to your bed before promptly turning and presenting her massive ass right in front of you as she prepared to sit. Dodging your way out from under your clueless aunt, you were left panting from the sudden sprint as she plopped herself down heavily onto your mattress, the sudden weight indent causing your tiny body to fling into the air slightly and land up on your pillow.

Noticing the speck of movement, Norah actually spotted you and quickly flashed a bright grin, "Ah, there you are!" Handing you over your portion of ice cream, she plucked you up and set you down in her warm lap before she began digging into her own and you sat in comfortable silence as you enjoyed your treat.

"Wow, thanks aunt Norah. Mom hardly ever lets us have ice cream. Mostly since Tracy is always acting out though!" Norah chuckled at your unfortunate truth before responding.

11423.content:
“Uh, actually…” Quinn rubbed her chin and leaned back in her seat. “You kinda opened up a lot…more than I expected, Hunter.” Your new roommate closed her eyes and sighed. “I guess…I’d be willing to talk a bit about myself, too.”

You were taken aback by this, but equally intrigued by the prospect. “Oh, I wouldn’t want to force you to do so, Quinn. If you’re sure, then that’s okay, but–”

“Yeah, I’m good.” Quinn interrupted, though you could tell it was from nervousness and not from being rude.

Taking your cue, you sat back and smiled at your beautiful giantess roommate. “Alright. Go ahead!”

The black-haired girl’s lips curled up into a smile that vanished as soon as it appeared. “Sure. Well, basically, my childhood was pretty simple. I’m an only child, so it was just me and my mom for…well…as long as I can remember. No clue when dad skipped out, but I must’ve been only a few months old. Mom always said it was because he wanted a boy, not a ‘weak little girl’, in his words.”

You frowned. “I’m so sorry to hear that, Quinn.”

Quinn shrugged, with only a faint wetness in her eye telling you how she really felt. “It’s whatever. Anyway, my mom…uh, her name is Becky, by the way. She had to care for me all by herself, but she caught a lucky break when she started up an online retailer website with one of her good friends. She and her friend would buy stuff from all over, and sell it for a few bucks cheaper online. However, they’d ship it all across the country, so they’d earn back a profit from shipping costs added onto the customer’s totals.”

Quinn was rambling by this point, and sensing that she was, she stopped herself to breath and blush ever-so-slightly. You smiled gently, amused by seeing a different side of Quinn from her normally apathetic behavior. It was clear that she held great respect and love for her mother.

Resuming, Quinn cleared her throat. “Basically, it wasn’t long before her store was getting revenue from ads, and gaining traction. Blah blah. It’s now pretty popular, and my mom soon became the manager instead of a direct buyer and supplier. She’s actually got a small team of people who do the daily work. She pretty much just lives her own personal life each and every day, save for a few meetings or phone calls each week.”

You nodded, suitably impressed. “Wow, that’s great. What’s the website called?”

“It’s, uh, called Shipping Hero. The motto is ‘finding the heroic deals, and shipping them to wherever you may be’. Tacky, right?” Quinn rolled her eyes as she spoke, but you gaped.

“No way. Tracy and I used to use that site all the time. That’s crazy?” You laughed, and Quinn actually chuckled a bit too. A moment later, you motioned for Quinn to continued. “Okay, so, your mom’s job was awesome, huh?”

“Eh.” Quinn said, while reaching for her phone. “It meant she had pretty much everyday free to baby me and dote on me like I was a little kid. I mean, yeah, I guess I was at one point, but she is still way too clingy and lovey-dovey. It’s exhausting.” Quinn scrolled around on her phone. “Like, see, look at this, Hunter. Our last vacation to the local amusement park. Can you believe her?” Quinn leaned forward in her seat and shoved the phone towards you.

You had to take a step back to fully analyze the photo, as it was practically a movie theater screen at your size. Glancing over the photo, you were about to respond to Quinn when your jaw dropped. The picture showed Quinn and a woman who looked startlingly similar to her beside a cardboard cutout of an animal mascot. Quinn was wincing from embarrassment, while the older woman was grinning like a child, while also clad in a t-shirt that read “My Daughter Is a Sweet Angel”.

This humorous aspect contrasted sharply with the woman’s outrageously pronounced curves. Surpassing even Quinn, the woman’s breasts stretched her too-tight top to the extreme, and you could plainly see her abundantly large rear end even from the front. Her hourglass figure was immaculate and hard to look away from, and it now made perfect sense where Quinn had inherited her own blessedly bountiful body from. Some strand of curviness genes clearly ran in the Wallace family.

Tearing your eyes from Quinn’s mother, you met your roommate’s gaze and laughed. “She seems like an awesome woman!”
Though intended as a light-hearted remark, Quinn’s face feel. “You’d actually hate her, Hunter. Or rather…I guess she’d hate you.”

You paused, confused. “What do you mean, Quinn? Does she warm up slowly to strangers?”

Your titanic new friend laughed humorlessly. “No, I wish. Truthfully, she despises tinies. Finds them distasteful and gross. She’s said so herself, word for word. She never told me why she hated tinies so strongly…but god she made it really damn clear with her actions. The things I’ve seen her do…”

Quinn trailed off, and your blood ran cold. There was a haunted look in Quinn’s eye, and a part of you didn’t want her to elaborate on whatever memories she was reliving. The other part of you knew that Quinn should, so that she could get it off her chest and allow total transparency between her and yourself.

Continuing, Quinn looked at you and sighed. “See, I used to have a lot of tiny friends. As in, way more than my normal-sized friends. I spent everyday hanging out with the tinies from my neighborhood and school. Trouble was, my doting and clingy mother was never far off, and when she’d find out about my tiny friends…it wasn’t long before I’d never see them again. And if it wasn’t my mom, it was just fate itself screwing over every single tiny I’ve ever known. Wasn’t long before I had no more friends.”

You hardly knew what to say, and could only gently rest your hand on Quinn’s thumb (as her hand holding the phone was still lying on the bed beside you. Touched by your gesture, Quinn spared you a quick smile before continuing.

“It’s part of the reason I care so much about you guys being strong and capable.” Quinn elaborated. “I’ve seen too many people treat you like, frankly, pieces of shit. It HURTS, watching it happen, but I can’t save every tiny, and god help me if I make things worse by trying. What I CAN do, though, is treat you like equals, with respect and dignity, and help you to get tougher all on your own.”

This was a whole new side of Quinn, and you were floored. Someone who had seemed like a cut-and-dry case of nonchalant emo girl had broken into a million pieces, revealing the caring girl with forward-thinking ideas and a traumatic past dueling inside of her. Your new roommate was the single most incredible and interesting person you’d ever met in your life, and you felt a rush of awe and something a little bit more as you looked at her.

A long moment of silence hung in the air, before Quinn coughed and refocused herself. “Um, anyway…ask away, Hunter. I’ll tell whatever stories you want, the good and bad. Shoot.”

“Why do you want to know that? I wouldn’t think you’d want to hear about the horrible things she does to people like you,” the look of confusion only lasted a second, going back to her usual neutral expression fairly quickly.
“Well, I guess it just seems like you’re not the kind of person who would talk about this kind of stuff normally. I think it would be good for you to get it out,” what you said to Quinn was true, but since this was Quinn’s mom, you also wanted to get information so you knew what to avoid if she ever came over while you were here. “It’s not good to keep this sort of stuff to yourself, it would maybe be good for you to talk about it.”
Quinn’s cheeks blushed slightly and she showed a faint smile before quietly uttering a soft “thanks”.

She shifted uncomfortably, seeming reluctant to talk about it.
“Quinn, we don’t have to talk about it if you don’t want to. If I overstepped we can talk about something-“ you were cut off again as Quinn’s nervous talking interrupted you again.
“No I’m good, it’s fine... I’m just trying to think of where to start.”
She sat there for a few moments, trying to figure out where to start. Suddenly she seemed to think of something.

“Ok so... as I said I had a lot of tiny friends growing up. My mom was usually very discreet in how she got rid of them, most of the time I suspected she had done something to them but there was never any evidence,” she sighed, obviously thinking about all the friends she had lost. “Until one time that I had two friends over, they were brothers, twins. Their names were Jack and Henry. This was when I was around fourteen. We were in my room, just chatting, when I suddenly needed to use the bathroom. On the way out I noticed my mom standing in the hall, in hindsight she was probably eavesdropping on us. I don’t know why, but I noticed at the time that she was standing barefoot.”
“So I go and use the bathroom, I’m only in there for five minutes at most. When I come out my mom was waiting outside. She said that Jack and Harry’s parents had showed up and they had left. I had thought it was strange but I just shrugged and took her word for it. Just as I walked past I happened to glance down and see that she was wearing a pair of tan socks. I had thought it was strange but didn’t realise what had actually happened till after I walked into my room and sat down.” She paused, clearly collecting herself. You put your hand on her thumb reassuringly once again, which got another small smile from her.
“So I rushed downstairs to confront her about it... but once I got downstairs I saw her pulling on some running shoes over my friends. I actually saw one of their faces on the sole of her foot! I was in so much shock I couldn’t say anything. She turned to look at me and got this huge smile on her face, she said something along the lines of “oh my sweet little angel, you look more beautiful every day” before hugging me,” she almost seemed to gag at the thought of her mother’s shower of affection. “I couldn’t bring myself to confront her, she was being so doting and loving, I couldn’t start a fight with her about it. She was one of the few people I was really close to at that time, I didn’t want to risk that. So I didn’t do anything, and she went off on a run, she must have ditched them somewhere because I never saw her wearing them again, and I didn’t see them ever again. They could still be out somewhere because I was too afraid to ruin my relationship with my mom, as well as all the other tiny guys she’s gotten rid of over the years.”
A single tear rolled its way down Quinn’s pale cheek, and there was a faint wetness in her eyes. She obviously felt incredibly guilty about it. Still holding your hands on her thumb, you looked up to your giantess roommate.
“Quinn, none of that was your fault. Your mom made those choices, it’s perfectly understandable to not want to jeopardise your relationship with her since it’s obvious you two were really close. Please don’t blame yourself,” she hung her head low even as you said this. “Just give me a warning whenever she comes over so I can find a good hiding place.”
You thought ending with a lighthearted joke would be best to cheer her up, and you did get a faint chuckle out of her.
“Thanks Hunter.”

She looked down at you with a slightly more serious face.
“I’ll give you warning before she comes over if she ever does, I haven’t told her where I live yet but I imagine she’ll find out eventually. So I’ll give you a few tips on her behaviour around tiny guys. She will act innocent and sweet when me or any other people her size are around. She usually crushes tinies on purpose but will pass it off as an accident. I’d also guess that she’d try to hide you on herself somewhere the instant she’s alone, because whenever a friend disappeared it was usually after I’d left them alone. I also don’t have any evidence for this but I’m sure she probably used Shipping Hero to get rid of some of them, but I can’t say for sure. So if she ever comes here I’ll make sure either me, Morgan or Avery will be with you at all times,” she didn’t smile down at you, but you could tell from her eyes that she was trying to reassure you. “Normally I’d be inclined to let you fend for yourself, but I’ve lost too many friends to her to let that happen.”
“Thanks Quinn, and for my part I’ll try to keep a low profile when she’s around,” you smile up to her.
“Yeah that’s probably best.”

What happens next?
1) You and Quinn continue to talk.
2) Morgan and Avery want to do something as a group.
3) There’s a knock at the door, Becky has tracked Quinn down and come to visit.
114232.title: Learning about Becky

choices: You want to go with Morgan and find a job at "Workout World".
You want to go with Avery and find a job at "Starlight Studios".
You want to go with Quinn and find a job at "Sanderson Beach".
115.content:
“Hey, I actually have a question for each of you.” You said after a moment. Seeing each of your new roommates look a bit more intently at you after saying that froze you up for a second, and you coughed awkwardly. “I-it’s a little…strange, I guess.”

Morgan smiled calmingly. “Go on. You don’t think we’re going to judge you, or anything, right?”

Avery cheerfully grinned. “Ask away, little buddy! We’d do anything for our tiny new roommate!”

Quinn motioned with her head for you to continue. “What’s up?”

You cleared your throat. “Well, just like you three, I’ve now graduated college. I have a degree in Communications, but honestly, it’s not my passion. I guess I don’t really have a direction in life. I consider myself pretty competent, especially for a tiny, but I don’t have a clue what my future has in store for me.” You paused to shuffle your feet awkwardly. “Basically, I wanted to hear about the jobs that you three have. Maybe that would give me some ideas.”

Morgan’s eyes widened. “Oh. Is that all? Were you thinking of maybe tagging along with us to our jobs and applying?”

Avery practically squealed with delight at the very thought. “Eee! That’s so cute!”

Quinn nodded approvingly. “Makes sense. Good idea, Hunter.”

“Thanks.” You replied to Quinn, before looking at Morgan. “Morgan, could you start?”

“Oh, totally.” The dark brown-haired girl said. “So, I’ve been working as an assistant employee at this local gym for a little while now. It’s called ‘Workout World’. It’s your standard gym, with a whole bunch of exercise machines and weights and what-not. We also have a few rooms in the back for special daily and weekly classes.

“After working at the gym for a while, I was just recently promoted. I now teach a weekly yoga class starting…tomorrow, I guess…and I’m really pumped about that. Might have trouble reigning myself in.” Morgan sheepishly smiled, admitting to her intensive workout routine. “But yeah, other than that I just do odds and ends jobs at the gym. Cleaning, registering new members, helping people with troublesome machines. That sort of thing.”

“Gotcha!” You said, giving her a thumbs up. “Thank you for being so thorough. How about you, Avery?” You asked, turning to the pink-haired giantess.

Avery grinned wildly. “Okay, so like, I have the best job in the world. I’m totally pretty, right?” Avery struck a pose and giggled, earning a nod from you and Quinn, and an eye roll from Morgan. “Apparently, other people totes think so too, because I got recruited right out of high school to be a model! And, and, and…” Avery nearly hyperventilated. “…I just landed the biggest gig of my life. I’m going to be a featured model for Starlight Studios!

“If you’re a nerd and don’t know…” Avery stuck out her tongue at Morgan playfully. “…Starlight Studios is a really huge photo agency near here. I’ve been there a few weeks, and it’s uber heaven! I can just wear cute outfits all day, pose for the camera, and come home with so much dough! Best of all, there totes aren’t any tiny models working at the studios, so you’d have a hella easy time getting hired!”

You took a moment to take all that in, then nodded. “Uh…thanks Avery. That sounds like a lot of fun. What about you, Quinn?” You inquired, looking at last to your final roommate.

The black-haired girl shrugged. “It’s not much, really. Nothing special. I wanted to get outside and around people a bit more, so I applied as a lifeguard at the beach near here. ‘Sanderson Beach’, heard of it? Anyway, they picked me. I’ve been working there for a month now. It’s not too bad, I guess, though the sun is hell on my skin. I have to put sunscreen on twice a day, at least.

“But…yeah, it’s as simple as it sounds. I’m either assigned to sit in one of the lifeguard towers and look out over the beach for any signs of trouble, or I patrol the sands, up and down the beach, and help people that way. Boring, but the right kind of boring.” She paused. “And it feels good to help people out…sometimes.”

You nodded appreciatively. “Okay, thank you, Quinn.”

Morgan leaned forward in her seat, a glimmer of hopefulness shining in her eyes. “Realistically, Hunter, you could only take one job. So, who do you want to go into work with tomorrow?”

Avery also leaned forward in her seat, though much more dramatically than her twin, and her breasts threatened to spill from her top. It was hard not to look. “Yeah, yeah! Who do you wanna tag along with, cutie?”

Quinn made no attempt to lean in, but she did raise her eyebrow questioningly. “Doesn’t matter to me who you go with.” She said nonchalantly.

For some reason, you could feel that this was a tremendously important moment, and so you really stopped to think about it. Who did you want to go with, and what job were you looking to pursue?
115.title: Entering the Job Market

choices: Heather wants you to teach the yoga class right alongside Morgan.
Heather needs you to fix some broken exercise machines giving her trouble.
Heather asks you to do some one-on-one fitness coaching with gym members.
1151.content:
“Actually, I think that working at the gym would be a pretty easy job for me to handle.” You reasoned. “I feel like there’s probably a lot I could do there that might help out. And I mean, I’m pretty fit for a tiny. I could help show people how to do stretches and stuff.”

Morgan smiled warmly. “I agree! ‘Workout World’ having a tiny fitness instructor helping out would be amazing.”

You could tell that Avery was pretty upset that you hadn’t picked her, and Quinn seemed mostly indifferent like normal, but with a twinge of disappointment on her face. However, there really was no way around it. It’d be impossible for you to balance three jobs at once. You just decided that you would need to hang out with them later to make it up to them.

The rest of the day passed by fairly uneventfully. The four of you spend time hanging around and chatting in the living room, eventually transitioning into watching a movie. The movie came after dinner, which was efficiently prepared by Morgan and served by Quinn. It was really just a few frozen meals heated up, but it was still a meaningful gesture and a tasty experience.

After the movie finished, it was nearing ten o’clock at night, and each of the girls meandered upstairs to their rooms. Surprisingly, they each seemed to have forgotten about you, and left you all by yourself on the couch in the living room. You couldn’t really blame them, as this was only the first night for the three girls living under the same roof as a tiny like yourself. Your existence hadn’t become fully routine for them yet. Thankfully, it wasn’t too cold in the living room, and the couch cushion was nice and comfy, so you easily fell asleep.

*****

You awoke to Morgan standing above you, gently saying your name to ease you out of slumber land. Giggling at your messy hair and bleary expression, Morgan carried you into the bathroom where you freshened up, and then into the kitchen. She fixed herself some cereal, making sure to give you a few crunchy pieces and a bottle cap filled with milk to serve as your own breakfast. It was incredible how good of a caretaker she was.

After breakfast, you both got changed into fresh sets of clothes, and you had to fight not to stare too much as Morgan returned from her bedroom wearing only a dark blue sports bra and matching compression shorts. Her clothing left most of her smooth, toned body on full display, while also highlighting and accentuating her sculpted curves. She was like a goddess of fitness, the ideal vision of physical perfection.

Your staring did not go unnoticed, and Morgan playfully flicked you for ogling her, before picking you up again. Saying goodbye to Quinn, who was eating her own breakfast (Avery was apparently still asleep upstairs), you and Morgan left the apartment. Morgan only took a small bag of spare clothes and a water bottle with her. She walked straight out to her car, and slid inside.

Depositing you gently in the passenger’s seat, you held onto the tethered seat belt to anchor yourself, and then the two of you were off. It was only a twenty-minute drive to “Workout World”, and you passed the time chatting with Morgan. She was the only girl you’d ever met outside of your family who treated you respectfully and sincerely, and earnestly treated you like a normal human being. It was an amazing feeling, and a flutter went off in your chest each time she smiled at you.

Pulling up to “Workout World”, Morgan parked her car, scooped you into her palm, grabbed her bag, and then headed inside. As she approached the gym, you noted that it didn’t look particularly too crazy from the outside. Just a run-of-the-mill gym, but perhaps a bit bigger than normal. It looked like it stretched back for a while, taking up a decent amount of space.

This observation was explained when Morgan walked through the door. Exercise machines as far as the eye could see stretched in all directions. Bikes, treadmills, rowing machines, elliptical machines, stair walkers, and more. One whole wall was taken up by a wide array of exercise mats, jump ropes, yoga balls, weights, and other assorted workout props. In the far back, you could see the doors leading to those exercise class rooms Morgan had mentioned.

Your giantess carrier approached the front desk, where a brilliantly smiling receptionist was waiting. The receptionist stood as Morgan approached, and you verbally choked.

The receptionist (who appeared to be in her thirties), was dressed in the same attire as Morgan, a sports bra and compression shorts. This indicated she was also a fitness instructor. However, due to being older and more mature, her more developed body strained at the seams of the sports bra and shorts, threatening to snap the fabric at any second. It was an incredibly risqué outfit choice.

Or, it would’ve been under normal circumstances. Glancing around the gym, which already had quite a few people in it, you didn’t see a single guy. There were giantesses of all ages, but no men to be seen. Was this a female only gym, or just a random coincidence?

“Good morning, Miss Mayfield.” Morgan waved to the receptionist. It was then that you noted the receptionist’s nametag, pinned proudly to her right breast. It read: ‘Heather Mayfield, Workout World Director’. Apparently, she was the big boss around here, but it was hard to fully believe that. Something about her aforementioned revealing clothing, and her mane of wavy blonde hair and young-looking face felt out of place.

“Mah stars, Morgan!” Heather clapped her hands together and grinned. “Is that a darlin’ lil’ tiny in yer hand?” She asked, pointing to you. Her southern drawl was unexpected, but her tone was light and airy.

“Yes, ma’am.” Morgan nodded. “He’s my new roommate, Hunter. He was wondering if he could apply for a job here.”

Heather beamed at you and Morgan. “Why, I reckon’ he can, honey! Shoot, ah’ll draw up the contract fer ya’ll right now!” The buxom woman bent over to dig around in her desk for a paper and pen, and you couldn’t help but notice the pendulum swaying motion of her tits as she did so. It was difficult to imagine this curvy woman leading any fitness classes. She reminded you of your own mother, actually.

Finally, she stood back up, contract in hand. Placing it proudly on the desk in front of you, you hopped down from Morgan’s hand and read it carefully. Everything seemed to be in order, so with some help from Morgan, it only took you a minute to sign your name. You were now an official member of the ‘Workout World’ team. That was easy!

Smiling down at you in a friendly manner, Morgan gave you a thumbs up, then returned her attention to her boss. “So, Miss Mayfield, what’s on my agenda today?”

Heather waved dismissively at Morgan. “Morgan, honey, ah told ya to call me Heather. But, anywho, yer main job today is to teach that yoga class. ‘Sides that, just help out ‘til yer shift ends.”

“And what should I do Miss…er…Heather?” You spoke up, striking a confident pose.

Heather laughed uproariously at your show of bravado, infectiously guffawing for a solid thirty seconds before calming down. “You, lil’ mister, have a special task fer yer first day. Ready fer it?”

You nodded enthusiastically, and Heather cleared her throat before continuing.
1151.title: First Day at the Gym

choices: Aoi continually messes with you during the class, as much as possible.
You stay safe from Aoi...but keep ending up under hyper-focused Morgan instead!
*Writer's Choice*
11511.content:
“There are two big thangs every gym employee needs ta know!” Heather smiled warmly at you, but with an earnest and serious look in her eye. “One: Ya gotta know yer stuff. How else can ya help out? Two: Ya gotta be all comfy-like around strangers. I’m expectin’ ya’ll to help anyone in need, and ya have ta be ready fer that.”

You nodded vigorously. “Oh, I’m sure I can handle that, Heather!”

Heather’s intensity eased up a little. “I know ya can, little guy. I believe in ya, Hunter. Tha’s why yer first task is ta co-teach with my darlin’ Morgan. Both of ya can work together.”

This surprised you slightly, but also made a reasonable amount of sense. You just hoped Morgan wouldn’t feel like you were intruding on her personal class. “O-of course, Heather. I’d be glad to help Morgan out.”

Heather grinned. “Glad to hear it, honey. Off ya go, now! Reckon’ yer class is startin’ any minute now.”

Without another word, you and Morgan were off. Morgan placed you back in her hand, and you held on nice and tight as she walked quickly towards the back of the Workout World gym, towards one of the side rooms. Slipping inside, you found the room empty of people, but filled with a surplus of exercise gear and supplies. About twenty, tan-colored yoga mats were spread out in rows facing a singular red yoga mat (presumably Morgan’s).

“Alright, Hunter, first day on the job! It’s pretty awesome that we’ll be co-teaching.” She said, beaming at you. This alleviated your earlier worry. “Though, you might want to let me field day one, and just copy my movements. Honestly, can’t imagine that you’ll be too much help for people behind the first row.” The dark brown-haired giantess smiled sheepishly at you. “Maybe later on we can have you walk around with the girls for more focused help.”

You paused. “The girls? And the guys too, right?”

Morgan actually blushed, faintly. “Uh…no. No, sorry Hunter. This class is entirely female. You’ll be the only guy.” She admitted, and try as you might, you couldn’t help but let your jaw drop open. This brought Morgan’s teasing nature back, and she smirked playfully. “Won’t be a problem, will it, Hunter?”

“U-uh…nope! N-no problem, Miss Sinclair.” You hastily saluted, hoping comedy would detract from your obvious fantasizing about this upcoming class. It apparently worked, as Morgan rolled her eyes at your antics and dropped the subject.

She also dropped you, though quite gently, squatting down to the floor and depositing you onto her red yoga mat. The view of the class was significantly different from such an angle, as was the view of your beautifully, revealingly dressed roommate and co-teacher. Half of Morgan’s face was blocked by her breasts from the vantage you were now at. It was very, very hard to not stare at her toned, lithe figure.

Catching your eye, Morgan motioned to the mats spread across the floor. “If you’re curious why no one is here, that’s because everyone usually shows up right as the class starts.” Morgan shrugged. “It makes sense to not show up early. I mean, we stretch and do warm-ups in class, so what could you even accomplish by coming early?”

“Yeah, I suppose!” You said, raising your voice just a bit so that she could hear you without bending back down.

“Won’t stop me from doing a few quick stretches to limber up!” Morgan smiled, and instantly launched into a few toe-touching and yoga posing warm-ups. You decided to follow suit, copying her movements as best you could, albeit on a one-inch scale. Morgan was a master, but you found her moves so succinct and smooth that even you could keep up.

That being said, it was hard not to notice how close her left foot kept drifting towards your body on some of her stretches. Her toes, sliding along the yoga mat, came quite close to making you uncomfortable, as you knew it would only take a slight shift on Morgan’s part to bury you completely under them. Glancing up at Morgan, you noted a content but focused expression on her face, and realized that she really did zone out while exercising.

A few minutes later, and the rest of the class arrived almost simultaneously, proving Morgan correct. Your own fantasies were also instantly confirmed, as it seemed that every single woman entering the class was utterly and unfathomably beautiful. Curvy, lean, beautiful, and alluring, each new girl caused your jaw to drop even further. This was to say nothing of how their tight workout clothing drew your eyes to them even more. Some girls wore yoga pants or tank tops, and some had booty shorts and sports bras even skimpier than Morgan’s own revealing attire.

The last girl in the room closed the door, and noticed that the last empty yoga mat was right in front of Morgan. Cutting through the room, she smiled politely at Morgan and took up position on the mat. However, as she steadied herself, her gaze locked right onto you, your miniscule form still down at Morgan’s feet. You gave her a wave, trying to appear confident. The girl raised her eyebrows, then smiled flirtatiously and gave you a wink. THAT certainly was a little foreboding.

The girl had pretty long black hair that was tied back in a messy ponytail, and judging from the shape of her eyes and face, and her tanned skin tone, she was of some Asian descent. She was a fairly curvaceous giantess, but her eye-catching curves were exasperated further by her one-size too small tank top and ludicrously minimalistic booty shorts. At the point they were at, they looked more like panties, revealing her long legs all the way up to her crotch, and most of her ass, if you had to guess. She almost certainly had nothing but a thong on underneath.

She kept staring at you with a seductive grin, but broke her gaze when Morgan spoke up. “Alright, girls! My name is Morgan Sinclair, but you can just call me Morgan. This marks the first day of our all-encompassing exercise class. Over the next few months, we’re going to be doing everything you’ve ever imagined goes on inside a gym, and much more. Stretches, poses, usage of equipment and machines…you name it. It WILL be exhausting.

“Thankfully, I’m not the one who has to lead you through this alone. Joining me in this endeavor of teaching the class is my good friend, Hunter. In case you don’t see him…he’s down by my feet.” As one, all twenty girls taking the class peered down at Morgan’s feet, and locked eyes with you. Any speech you had prepared died on your lips as twenty beautiful, sexily dressed giantesses stared at you intently. Some had looks of surprise, others happy expressions, a few matched the flirtatiousness of the girl in front of you, and a few even looked disgusted.

Morgan drew eyes back to her. “Yes, he’s a tiny, and by extension, a guy. There will not be any other guys in this class, as Hunter is the exception. He just joined as an employee of this gym, and needs all the experience he can get. He’ll help all of you out, just make sure to treat him nicely.”

You stammered out a welcome. “I-I look forward…to h-helping!” Your feeble reply was so quiet that no one in the class seemed to even hear it, not even Morgan, who was already pushing out with her introductory spiel. Only the girl in front of you, her eyes constantly flicking down to you, seemed to pick up on your pathetic statement. She flashed you a quick smile and another wink.

Morgan went around the room asking everyone to give their name, their estimated level of exercise experience, and one fun fact about them. You lost track of names almost immediately, even though Morgan demonstrated enviably capability in memorizing everyone’s name. To your credit, you were still distracted by the girl in front of you, who kept doing seemingly absentminded things like adjusting her tank top or picking at her shorts. However, from the way she never tore her gaze from you, you knew all her casually seductive actions were on purpose.

As she was last to enter, she was last to introduce herself, and your flirtatious terrorizer smiled broadly to the class. “Sup everyone! My name is Aoi, and I’m stoked for this class. My level of exercise is…probably moderate? I do a lot of stretches and yoga, but not much else. A fun fact would be that I find tinies to be the cutest little things! Lucky me, huh?” Aoi gestured to you, and you flushed bright red. A few other girls, and even Morgan, laughed. It was clear that Morgan took Aoi’s statement as lighthearted teasing and nothing more.

Morgan gave her class a thumbs up. “Alright, that’s all the boring stuff out of the way! Ready to get into it, girls?”

A chorus of cheers and shouts answered her, and Morgan prepared to launch into the starting warmups. You did so too, but not without catching Aoi’s eye on last time. The flirty and mischievous glint in Aoi’s eye told you everything. Getting a good exercise was now second priority to her. Having fun with you was her only true goal.

Gulping, you could only hope that Morgan could keep Aoi and the other girls at bay for this first day. Of course, it she got lost in the rhythm of exercise, you’d be practically gone from her world, and left alone to defend yourself. Truly, what had you gotten yourself into?
11511.title: Co-teaching with Morgan

choices: Morgan eventually spots you on Aoi's ass, but as for freeing you...
You go unnoticed all class, and are still stuck to Aoi when she leaves.
You soon peel off Aoi's ass, only to end up engrained onto her yoga mat instead!
115111.content:
“We’re going to start with a few standard standing exercises. Get the blood flowing in our arms a bit.” Morgan explained to the class, then effortlessly switched into holding her arms by her chest and twisting her torso side-to-side. Her motions were slow but deliberate, stretching her muscles nicely while also serving as any easy example for everyone in the class to follow.

You mirrored your giantess co-teacher’s display without a problem, and you could only hope the rest of the class would be this easy. As it was, only the first row of girls actually paid you any mind, and even then, Aoi was the only girl to stare at you consistently, her attention seemingly unable to lock onto anything but you. You faltered a bit, under her flirtatiously predatory gaze, but kept up with Morgan’s pace, determined not to fail at your first ever class.

Morgan moved on to arm windmills and shoulder stretches, with you and the rest of the class following suit. One of the girls even asked if some light music could be turned on, and after Morgan agreed, soft peppy rock music filtered through the room, helping everyone to get into the mood. You would’ve considered it fun if it wasn’t for Aoi’s continual sultry winks. Truthfully though, it was pretty much heaven, guiding a group of curvaceous beauties through their exercise routines. You couldn’t complain TOO much.

After a good ten minutes or so, Morgan clapped her hands to draw everyone’s attention. “Alright, great job so far, ladies! This is awesome, isn’t it?” Morgan clenched her fist excitedly, earning a few smiles and laughs from the class. It was hard for anyone to resist being drawn up into Morgan’s whirlwind of excitement and passion for exercise. “Time for some stretches for our legs, and then the crazy stuff will come next!”

Morgan, without hesitation, plopped down onto her yoga mat, firm buttocks clapping onto the ground. She wasn’t that close to hitting you, but the sight still chilled your blood, and your legs wobbled from the vibrations of her impact. Of course, you straight up fell onto your back as the other giantesses in the class sat down at once, their combined weight hitting the floor causing a veritable earthquake from your perspective.

Picking yourself up, you caught the eye of Aoi, who was looking at you with a grin, clearly amused by seeing you topple over. Worse still, as Morgan stretched her legs out in front of her to set the example for the class, Aoi did so as well. In a flash, her right foot kicked out towards you, stopping right before coming into contact with your body. You flinched and let out a tiny, almost inaudible cry, and were left with the black-haired girl’s foot hanging precariously over you.

You were just about to crawl back to a safe distance when Morgan spoke up, momentarily distracting you. “Alright, let’s start with some simple stretches. Lean forward and touch your toes, if you can. Some of you more endowed girls might not make it, but any amount of stretching helps.” This statement caused a bit of embarrassed blushing from the aforementioned top-heavy students, but everyone still followed along to the best of their ability.

Despite being quite abundantly blessed in the chest department herself, Aoi demonstrated unfathomable flexibility by easily leaning all the way forward, bending her back to touch her toes with ease. As she did so, she peered down at you, her smug grin only growing in size as she noticed your horribly failed attempts to avert your gaze from the abyss of her cleavage. Truly, her breasts looked fit to pop right out of her size-too-small top from the simple movements of her leaning forward.

Distracted by Aoi, you missed a girl a little ways to your left, also in the front row, who was visibly struggling with keeping up with Morgan. She’d been one of the girls Morgan had been speaking to earlier, and her astronomically gargantuan breasts were comical in scale, and utterly hindering her movements. Thankfully, Morgan caught sight of her struggle, but you mentally chastised yourself for letting Aoi distract you from your job.

“Hey, it’s alright.” Morgan said to the girl, focusing all her attention on her. “Easy, slow movements. I know it can be tricky.” Morgan’s tone was soft and soothing, full of encouragement, and the girl (who had looked fit to cry any moment), blushed and gave Morgan a grateful smile.
