In the air, you got a brief glimpse of the woman, like time was slowing down. She appeared to be in her late twenties or so, and she was of some Asian descent. Her black hair was pulled back in a ponytail, though a few strands hung loose over her glasses-framed face. She was wearing a tight, white button-up blouse and black miniskirt. There was something about her that emanated importance, like an aura of authority.

Any further thoughts left you when you splattered down onto the clipboard the woman was carrying in front of her, your squishy body impacting against the hard board and flattening out like an accordion. You groaned at the pain, and began focusing on reforming, even as the woman finished approaching Avery. She’d been locked on Avery, and had not yet taken notice of your landing on her clipboard.

“Avery. Almost late.” The woman said, quickly and efficiently. “Shoot is coming up in just a few minutes. We can’t fall behind schedule.”

Avery winced, and gave the woman a winning smile. “Overslept, Konomi. Won’t happen again! But at least I brought a surprise!”

The woman, Konomi, adjusted her glasses. “What’s the surprise?”

By this point, you’d reformed, and were just standing up on Konomi’s clipboard. You brushed yourself off and waved to her, the movement drawing both women’s eyes to you.

“That’s the surprise!” Avery gushed. “Hunter, my new tiny roommate! He wants to try being a model!”

Konomi looked at you, then at Avery, then back at you, and frowned. “That’s not really how it works. You need experience to work here at Starlight Studios.”

Avery pouted adorably. “But boss! He’d be the first tiny model here!” She pleaded, then hesitated. “Actually…he’d be the first male model too. Hee hee! That’s awesome!”

You whirled on Avery, totally floored by her revealing that you’d be the only guy in this entire building. Why hadn’t she told you earlier? Looking back to Konomi, any objection you thought of voicing fell away upon noticing her expression. She was staring at you intently, her eyes flicking rapidly. Millions of thoughts were racing through her head, and you could swear you almost literally saw dollar signs appear in her eyes.

Finally, she smiled. “You know what, Avery. You’re right. Hunter would be perfect here as our first male model AND first tiny model.” She cleared her throat. “For an introduction, my name is Miss Konomi, and I’m the studio director. I lead most of the photo shoots. Starlight Studios prides itself on providing high quality photos to all our clients…no matter the difficulty or strangeness of their needs.”

That unnerved you a bit, so you folded your arms. “What would I have to do?”

Konomi waved off your concern. “Oh, nothing much. Pose for photos all day. Sometimes wear certain outfits. Occasionally act out…things.” Konomi seemed to push down a smile. “Really, it isn’t hard, and it pays extraordinarily well.” In a quieter voice, she continued. “The things we can do now with a tiny model…”

You were still apprehensive, but Avery shouted with glee. “He’ll take the job! Lil’ cutie Hunter won’t let you down!”

Konomi smiled warmly, with a strange aura behind it. “Great! I’ll get everything signed up, then!”

Ten minutes later, and you were officially a Starlight Studios model, much to Avery’s joy, Konomi’s pleasure, and your cautious optimism. What is your first assignment?
1152.title: First Day at the Studio

choices: "Please shape Hunter into a red article of clothing for your half of the shoot"
"Please put on some of the women's line and demonstrate the sticky qualities!"
*Writer's Choice*
11521.content:
"I'm sorry I was hesitant at first, Avery, but bringing Hunter on as part of the Starlight Studios team is actually a fantastic idea!" Konomi said to both of you. At this point the two giantesses were strolling down a long hallway, with you sitting precariously on Avery’s hand as she walked. You had spent the last ten minutes on Konomi’s desk signing the necessary paperwork to fill out your modeling contract, and to be quite honest you didn’t read much of it at all. You could have sworn you saw a line or two that said something like “zero liability for any workplace injuries” but every time you slowed down to read something more carefully, Avery would lean her enormous cleavage mere inches above you out of excitement. As a 21 year old man you couldn’t help but feel distracted by the proximity of this jiggling beauty, and as a result you ended up simply signing where you needed to sign and that was the end of it.

The three of you reached a set of double doors, Konomi leading the way with Avery and yourself in tow. The seemingly work-focused professional manner contrasted harshly with the bubbly exuberance of your current carrier. Konomi walked with intimidating intention and elegance while Avery practically skipped with every step, forcing you to cling on to one of her fingers in fear of flying off yet again. You looked around the room and figured that this must be the primary room where photoshoots were taken; it was enormous. It must have been a large warehouse in the past because there were countless micro stages set up with all kinds of varying decor. To name just a few you saw a suburban living room, a bedroom, an upscale bathroom, a city street, a fake beach, even a fake gym setup. This place was professional, no doubt about that, it seemed like they could whip up whatever environment they needed for a shoot in a moment’s notice.

Konomi stopped at the bedroom set, located right next to the fake city street, before grabbing a box off of a nearby table.

“We actually received a shipment of clothes from this new brand, Micro-Flex, just last week! Check it out!” Konomi popped the top off of a box that was probably the size of a deck of cards, but it held countless articles of clothing designed for one inch tall guys like you.

“Woah, that’s so freakin cool! That stuff looks totally cute and Hunter has a great bod, I’m sure he’ll rock all of it!” Avery said, peering into the box.

You blushed slightly at your new roommate’s compliment. She was without a doubt quite flirtatious, and her overwhelmingly positive attitude seemed quite endearing to you already. You simply smiled and peered down into the box from your perch on Avery’s hand, seeing a variety of shirts, shorts, and pants. It seemed like every color you could think of was present in that tiny box, and you had to admit you were quite excited to be modeling them! You had some qualms about the dangers of being a tiny model amongst various giantess models, but it seemed like your first shoot was going to be pretty straightforward.

Catching you staring at the clothes, Konomi spoke up, “Don’t just stand there and stare! Pick an outfit and try it on!” Looking up at the business casual woman as she spoke, you could practically see dollar signs forming in her eyes. You could tell that she took her work quite seriously, and this contract from Micro-Flex was most likely quite lucrative for the studio.

Without another word, Avery moved you towards the box and you picked out a matching pair of red shirt and shorts. Wondering briefly if you were going to have any privacy to change, you looked up to meet the piercing stares of both giantesses above you and knew that the answer was no. Shaking your head and chuckling slightly you began to change in plain sight, stripping down to your boxers before sliding the red clothes on. You never considered yourself to be a shy person, and to be honest you were quite proud of your physique, so doing so didn’t seem like a huge deal to you. Unbeknownst to you, Avery looked you up and down, raising her eyebrows in approval. But after a moment you were ready for the shoot.

Lowering you to the ground on the fake sidewalk of the city street set, Avery then backed away and flashed a thumbs up as Konomi set up the camera to focus on you. You stretched a bit and had to admit, the Micro-Flex clothing sure was comfortable. It felt like no matter how you moved, the clothing moved with you and wasn’t restrictive in the slightest.

“Okay, Hunter, you ready? Just strike some natural poses! Walk around a bit, pretending you’re just going for a stroll through the city. Whatever’s natural.” Konomi said, looking through the lens.

“Can do!” you responded happily. Konomi then set the camera to automatically take photos every second or so. You tried your best to look natural, cycling through a variety of poses and actions to give a bunch of different angles. Avery seemed absolutely elated that you were taking to the job so easily, and Konomi herself even seemed impressed with your capabilities. The asian giantess slowly walked around the set, ending up herself on the far end of the fake sidewalk that you were on. You assumed she was just inspecting your poses from different angles, and you spoke up to her.

“Hey so what’s so special about these Micro-Flex clothes anyway? They feel great and all but what’s the selling point?” You made small talk, asking the giantess standing near you.

Konomi smiled and simply said, “Why don’t I show you?” Before you knew it the woman began walking the same powerful, elegant strut that she was earlier, now towards you on the fake sidewalk. It took her no more than a few steps to reach you, as your mind was going haywire trying to process what was happening. Before you could make a single move, Konomi’s black heeled shoe slammed down onto your body, obliterating you into the pavement. Avery gasped and covered her mouth, Konomi simply stood with her weight pressed onto you until she heard the *click* of the automatic camera.

After the first click things only got worse. Konomi began to twist and grind her sole onto you, causing you excruciating pain and smearing you flat into the false sidewalk. You couldn’t believe that this photoshoot had taken such a dark and sudden turn into torture for you. After a series of more *clicks* from the camera, Konomi finally stepped off of you, and continued walking forward until she reached the edge of the city set. You heard one final click, no doubt taking a picture of your absolute splattered, two dimensional body stuck to the ground.

Avery was still too stunned to act, not knowing how carelessly her boss would treat her new roommate. Part of her was torn between standing up for you, but also part of her knew that this job meant the world to her, and risking it seemed like the last thing she wanted to do. While it didn’t seem like Konomi took joy in what she just did, it definitely seemed like she had little concern for your wellbeing. She simply turned off the automatic picture taking feature of the camera and then looked down at you.

You hadn’t been squashed for more than a few seconds, so despite the beatdown you just took you found yourself popping back to normal rather quickly. And just as you did you stood up.

“Check out the clothes.” Konomi said to you.

You looked at your outfit, and with one single wipe of your hands to shake off the dirt and grime that came off of the sole of her heel, there wasn’t a trace of the damage that Konomi had just done to you! The clothes looked brand new!

“It’s a new proprietary fabric from the company, very hush hush and all that. But they said that one of the downsides of the many mishaps that little men like you have with giantesses like us is that the cheap cotton clothes made for you tend to rip off without the slightest bit of effort from us! These clothes promise to stay clean and on your body no matter the way you are twisted or treated! Each article even naturally sticks together if you apply enough pressure!” Konomi explained the benefits of the magical clothing with perhaps a bit of callousness towards the plight of tiny men, but you couldn’t argue with the results. These clothes really were a game changer. You saw even Avery had shifted to her focus, immediately forgetting her worries about you towards fascination towards the brand.

“Now here’s where you come in, Avery.” Konomi turned to the beautiful, giddy girl, and spoke.

“..."

choices: Konomi wants to move onto more shots focused on Avery's ass.
Konomi wants to move onto more shots focused on Avery's boobs.
*Writer's Choice*
115212.content:
“Avery, please put on some of the women’s line and demonstrate the sticky qualities.” Konomi explained, pointing to a box resting on a table behind your beautiful roommate.

Avery’s expression burst into blissful exuberance. “What? There’s a line for girls too! That’s totes super amazing!” Literally jumping up and down with excitement, you paled at the sight of her hefty chest bouncing in time with her joy. Shaking yourself out of staring, you watched Avery scamper away to the box to get changed. Turning your back on her, you decided that you could at least be a gentleman in some ways.

Konomi tapped her clipboard to get your attention. “Now, Hunter, you might’ve picked up that I mentioned certain ‘sticky qualities’. As this implies, these next set of photos are going to require you being squished or stretched.” She smiled at you, but it didn’t take a genius to see the money-making glint in her eyes. “Will that be a problem?”

You emphatically shook your head. “No ma’am! No problem here!” You put on a show of confidence, even though you weren’t entirely looking forward to what was coming. Still, if this was all a test by Konomi, you weren’t going to back down and fail. And, even if it wasn’t a test, the more money that Konomi made, the more you and Avery would rake in. Win-win situation all around, you figured.

Avery returned after a minute, and her new outfit was a far cry from the casual ensemble she’d worn to the studio. She was clad from her neck to her toes in a sleek, sporty bodysuit that clung so tightly to her curvy supermodel body it might as well have been her second skin. The bodysuit was black with hot pink stripes racing across it, and looked exceptionally comfortable and maneuverable. The rational part of your brain admired the design of the fabric…while the hormonal part of your brain couldn’t stop ogling every inch of Avery. Ironically, despite literally covering most of her skin, the bodysuit left little to the imagination in practice.

Your staring didn’t go unnoticed by Avery, who struck a dynamic pose and winked at you. “You like what ya see, don’tcha, Hunter? Hee hee! It is pretty sick, huh?”

You blushed and averted your eyes, too embarrassed to mumble an apology or excuse, which only further enriched Avery’s infectious giggles. Konomi was smiling too, but another look into her eyes told you that the gears in her head were spinning. What they were spinning about, only time would tell.

“Okay, you two.” Konomi clapped her hands. “Time to jump into it. These next few photos will involve most of our varying sets, but only for context and lighting purposes. The main point is to highlight how Micro-flex outfits stick and adhere to one another.” She eyed Avery carefully. “You’ll need to squish Hunter a bit, alright?”

Avery frowned just a little. “Oh. I will? On purpose?”

“Yes, but he’s okay with that. He already told me that it doesn’t bother him at all.” Konomi said, the lie sliding easily out of her lips.

You jerked your head over to her. “W-wait, I didn’t exactly say–”

“Oh, awesome! Okay then!” Avery exclaimed, her bright and cheery voice cutting off your attempt at clarification. Before you could try again, Konomi picked you up and carried you over to the fake gym set in the studio. A bit callously, she dropped you down onto the floor beside a treadmill, then sauntered over to adjust the camera. You picked yourself up off of the floor, once more amazed at how immaculate and clean your clothes were. Micro-flex was genuinely revolutionary.

Konomi steadied the camera, then motioned to Avery. “Alright, Avery. Simple shot first. Step on up and then…well…STEP onto Hunter.”

Apparently still a little apprehensive, Avery responded with a weak nod, biting her lip in an adorable fashion. Walking over to you, you were momentarily taken aback by just how humongous she was side-by-side with your bug-sized body. She was a gorgeous, heavenly goddess of a giantess, and standing down at her feet made you feel a mix of both awe and fear. You didn’t quite know why.

Well, maybe it was fear of the obvious, as, after sparing you a quick smile, Avery stepped down onto you, burying you under her left foot. Your body offered no resistance, flattening out into a paper-thin shape immediately. You were crushed out into a disc against Avery’s heel, and, sure enough, you felt your clothes stick to Avery’s bodysuit instantly. It was a strong adhesion too, not unlike glue, and when Avery lifted her foot a second later, you went with it.

Demonstrating her flexibility, Avery twisted her leg up and held her foot in front of her face, spotting the red-colored flat circle that was your body on her heel. Giggling, she lightly poked your body, squishing your face a bit more into her heel.

“Hee hee! One second of squishing, and you’re flat as can be, Hunter. Soooo cute!” Avery gushed.

From a business point of view, Konomi was pleased too, but hardly satisfied. “Excellent, Avery. Now, step on him again, but this time grind your heel along the ground. Really work him into your foot.”

Though an airheaded ditz most of the time, Avery wasn’t dumb, and she looked at Konomi with shock. “Wha? Wouldn’t that hurt the poor cutie?”

Konomi shook her head succinctly. “Not at all. I mentioned that Micro-flex reduces sensations of pain for tinies, remember? Hunter will be just fine.”

This was yet another lie, and you picked up on it right away. However, crushed flat, you had no way of shouting to Avery that Konomi was making things up, so your pink-haired partner simply blinked once to process what Konomi said, then grinned happily. “Oh, okay! That’s totes cool. He’s, like, invincible, huh? Wow!”

Airheaded Avery was back and in full force, and your current position left you powerless to defend yourself. You could just barely manage a wince in preparation for your next few seconds, as Avery just about slammed her foot back onto the ground. Convinced by Konomi’s words that you couldn’t feel a thing right now, Avery ground her heel against the floor with violent, reckless abandon, genuinely laughing at how loose she was letting herself be. Konomi watched with reserved fascination.

When Avery hoisted her foot back up thirty seconds later, you were more of a red stain spread across her entire heel than a simple circle, and were even more adhered to the fabric of her Micro-flex bodysuit than before. This pleased Konomi greatly, and the astute businesswoman eagerly snapped some shots.

“Okay, Avery...and Hunter. Excellent jobs so far.” Konomi glanced at her clipboard. “Micro-flex, along with testing their durability and sticky qualities, would really like us to take some publicity photos for their website that focus on tinies being squished and crushed in day-to-day settings.”

Avery frowned adorably at this direction, and let her foot fall back down, squishing you into the floor once more. “Really? That’s uber weird. Like, how does that make sense for a company that totes supports tinies.”

“It’s simple, Avery.” Konomi said gently, almost soothingly. “By taking fake candid photos, we can supply Micro-flex with data about how their product functions in real-life situations. On top of that, we can provide promotional materials that demonstrate how trapped or squashed tinies can be spotted and rescued, based on how they stick to other Micro-flex materials. Training tools, if you will.”

Avery had been bouncing on her feet during this entire explanation, repeatedly lifting her heels then digging them back down into the floor. Apparently, your current location had fled her vacant mind already. She finally stopped though, and clapped her hands together. “Ah, I gotcha! That’s so crazy awesome! I love helping out like this, and I’m sure Hunter does too!”

Konomi nodded. “Oh, he does. He told me while you were changing that he is good to go with these photo shoots for as many hours as we might need them. He said he’ll do anything for Starlight Studios!” A third lie was just as easy as the others. You didn’t hear a word, buried into the floor because of Avery’s heel, but if you had, you would’ve just been even more upset.

Blushing, Avery bit her lip again, and looked down at her foot, finally remembering where you were. “Sounds like something that little stud would say. OMG, he’s too much!”

“Now, can we continue?” Konomi walked back to the camera, and gestured towards the treadmill. Avery was more than happy to oblige her boss. In her mind, not only was this more fun than she’d had in weeks, but she was determined to not drag down the experience for Konomi and you. As far as she was concerned, you were taking to modeling like it was your calling in life, and Avery would do everything to be the best damn partner for you.

For the next twenty minutes, Avery and Konomi took photos around the gym, with you still stuck to Avery’s foot like you belonged there. Each new step further cemented you in place, the fabric of your clothes and your titanic roommates bodysuit meshing tightly, intertwining. It never stop hurting, and you silently begged for anything else but foot shots. Konomi had Avery posing on the treadmill, the bike, and the Stairmaster, each snapshot focusing on your crushed body and Avery’s impressively nonchalant and unaware attitude. These were all meant to be candid, after all.

When the shooting calmed down, it took Avery and Konomi together to peel you free from Avery’s foot, leaving you as an exhausted flat strip. Konomi scooped you up and held you tightly in her fist as she walked on to the next set, not enough to hurt but enough to keep you flat and unable to yell at her for the way she was tricking Avery into treating you. Powerless, your first day of hellish modeling continued…

1153.content:
“Actually, I think that working at the beach would be a pretty easy job for me to handle.” You reasoned. “I love to help people out, and I think that I’m pretty athletic. I don’t know how good I’d be at saving people, but I can help with any other issues, or be on the lookout for people in need.”

Quinn smiled approvingly. “That’s a good attitude to have. You’ll fit in, I guess.”

You could tell that Morgan was a bit letdown that you hadn’t picked her, and Avery was pretty upset that you hadn’t chosen her either. However, there really was no way around it. It’d be impossible for you to balance three jobs at once. You just decided that you would need to hang out with them later to make it up to them.

The rest of the day passed by fairly uneventfully. The four of you spend time hanging around and chatting in the living room, eventually transitioning into watching a movie. The movie came after dinner, which was efficiently prepared by Morgan and served by Quinn. It was really just a few frozen meals heated up, but it was still a meaningful gesture and a tasty experience.

After the movie finished, it was nearing ten o’clock at night, and each of the girls meandered upstairs to their rooms. Surprisingly, they each seemed to have forgotten about you, and left you all by yourself on the couch in the living room. You couldn’t really blame them, as this was only the first night for the three girls living under the same roof as a tiny like yourself. Your existence hadn’t become fully routine for them yet. Thankfully, it wasn’t too cold in the living room, and the couch cushion was nice and comfy, so you easily fell asleep.

*****

You awoke to Quinn standing above you, saying your name and lightly pushing the couch cushion with her foot to shake you awake. When you sat up groggily, she seemed to smile somewhat at your disheveled appearance, before switching back to her usual apathetic expression.

“Breakfast in the kitchen.” She said, jerking her head to motion towards the kitchen. She then sauntered away, leaving you to fulfill your morning obligations yourself. This way of treatment was still foreign to you, but there was something empowering about a giantess letting you act completely on your own.

After getting dressed and freshening up, you trekked over to the kitchen, narrowly avoiding Morgan’s pounding feet as she strode to the front door. You would’ve hated to get trampled under her sneakers as she left for the gym, so you were lucky you’d leapt to the side in time. You were doubly lucky Avery was still asleep too, as you had no doubt, she’d find a few to screw this morning up for you in that ditzy, bubbly way of hers.

Climbing up onto the kitchen table, you found that Quinn had set you aside some crackers and a shot glass of apple juice to drink from. Giving her an appreciative thumbs up, you dug into your meal, easily satisfying your hunger before you’d even finished off all of the crackers. Quinn didn’t say anything during the meal, but you caught her staring at you twice.

Finished eating, Quinn lifted up a duffel bag of her own onto the table, and gestured to an unzipped pocket on the side. “Get in. Easiest way to carry you, Hunter.”

“Sure thing.” You nodded, obliging the black-haired giantess. Scrambling up into the pocket, you fit snuggly inside. You watched the outside world disappear as Quinn zipped it up, and then everything began to swing and shake as Quinn shouldered the bag and headed for the door. In almost any other circumstance, this would terrify you, but you felt strangely at peace with placing your trust in your new roommate.

You felt your bag being set down on the passenger’s seat, and then the car start up. It was a bit boring in the bag, but surprisingly comfy, and one hundred percent safe. The drive to the beach took a little over a half hour, but finally you heard the car stop. Quinn picked the bag back up, and gently patted the pocket you were in.

“We’re here. Sanderson Beach.” She explained, and if you listened closely enough, you could hear the seagulls and the waves in the distance. “I need to go to the employee locker room to change, and then I’ll take you to the office to meet with Brigitte.”

You pounded back against Quinn’s hand as a sign of understanding, earning yourself the quietest and quickest of laughs you’d ever heard, before your giantess carrier headed off to the locker room. You couldn’t do much but keep waiting in the pocket, but you obviously knew why. In fact, you began to feel both embarrassed and intrigued by the fact that Quinn was now carrying you into the women’s locker room. You had never in your life been in one.

Ten minutes of mostly silence passed, though you heard Quinn give a muffled ‘hello’ to someone else in the locker room with her. Finally, your pocket was unzipped, and you were quickly grabbed up by Quinn’s giant, soft hand, her fingers enveloping you as she retrieved you. You were taken out of the bag and placed down on one of those hard-wooden benches common in locker rooms, and found yourself staring up at the black-haired giantess.

All rational thought fled your mind. Your jaw openly dropped, and your knees felt weak. Quinn had been unfathomably attractive upon first meeting her, but this was on a whole other level. While you’d been in the bag, she’d changed into what you could only assume was her lifeguard uniform. Though it was only a simple red one-piece bikini at the end of the day, the very sight of it rocked your world.

Quinn’s heavily abundant chest was wildly pronounced, as her gigantic breasts strained against the tight fabric of the bikini. The bikini clung to Quinn’s body like a second skin (at a guess, it was a size too small for the curvaceous girl), and showed off so much of her porcelain smooth flesh. Every time Quinn so much as shifted slightly, her boobs jiggled, and the word ‘LIFEGUARD’ which was printed across her chest was stretched and distorted to a comical degree.

Noticing your extremely obvious stare, Quinn frowned and crossed her arms, succeeding only in squishing her abundant breasts more prominently. “Wow, perv. I thought you were better than that, Hunter.”

You hastily clamped your jaw shut and stammered out a defense. “I-I just didn’t k-know you had changed! Caught me off guard!”

“It was the only spare uniform close to my size that they had.” Quinn sighed. “That’s why it’s so…” She cut herself off, and a faint color flared up in her cheeks. “A-anyway…it sucks, but whatever. Doesn’t bother me that much.”

“I think you look really great!” You said, smiling (and secretly praying that a compliment was the right course of action here).

Quinn quirked her mouth in a show of disbelief. “What?”

“I said you look great! Really!” You nodded enthusiastically.

Quinn seemed to debate whether you were being sincere or not for another second, and then finally smiled very softly. The blush had returned to her cheeks. “Th-thanks, Hunter.”

Grabbing up her bag, Quinn effortlessly tied her short hair back and out of her eyes, then turned to put her bag into the locker behind her. For the second time in a row, your breath caught in your throat, and your jaw fell back open again.

If Quinn was impressive from the front, her backside was a heaven all onto itself. Her humongous derriere was impossibly alluring in her one-piece, each plump but doughy cheek perfectly sculpted into a big bubble booty. The one-piece left most of Quinn’s creamy cheeks exposed, and it squeezed her ass so tight that the slightest movement shook it like an irresistible bowl of jelly. You desperately wished for nothing else than to leap into its pillowy embrace, this butt to end all butts bigger and more entrancing than any on the planet, in your books.

Oblivious to your staring, Quinn put her bag into her locker, then turned back to pick you up. Holding you in her hand, she walked out of the locker room and to the office. As she walked, you found it nigh impossible to not stare at her bountiful bosom or bodacious booty bounce and sway as she walked. Quinn was on a whole other level of thickness and beauty, and it was a shame she seemed oblivious to that. You also took note of how her one-piece seemed to keep riding up her butt crack, revealing even more of her ass. That whole ‘size too small’ issue was causing her a wedgie she had to keep picking out.

At the office, Quinn introduced you to the chief lifeguard of Sanderson Beach, Brigitte. Brigitte was a twenty-five-year-old woman whose standout features were her fiery mane of red hair and her pronounced muscles and defined abs. She was alluringly muscled, fit but still feminine. Her own one-piece fit much more naturally than Quinn’s, but she was still decently curvy under it. Her smile was award-winning.

“So, little dude, it’s a job you want?” Brigitte asked, still smiling at you. It was a bit intimidating, how closely she was leaning in towards Quinn’s hand to look at you.

“Uh…yes! Yes, ma’am! Any job you need, I’ll do it.” You proudly declared.

Brigitte grinned. “Love the attitude, man! I’ll hold you to that.” She stood back to her full height of 6’2”, and walked out from behind her desk. From what you’d gathered, she spent most days handling office affairs. “Let’s see…it’s sudden to throw on another new lifeguard. We already have three others on shift today…”

Quinn mused. “With three lifeguard towers overlooking the beach, we can always use more eyes.”

“True.” Brigitte agreed. “Tell ya what, Hunter. Do me proud for one whole week, and you’ve got a guaranteed position. Deal?”

“Absolutely!” You said, shaking the red head’s extended finger as a show of signing off on this new job. What’s your first task?

11531.content:
“Well, if testing you is what we’re going with…” Brigitte tapped her chin, and looked at Quinn. Her eyes lit up. “Quinn! Take Hunter with you to the middle tower. He’ll be your partner for today’s shift, and maybe the rest of the week.”

Quinn nodded, understanding. “Of course.”

You smiled broadly. “Sounds like a plan to me, boss!”

Brigitte laughed at your bravado. “Alright, then get going, you two! Guard some lives!”

You and Quinn both nodded again, before you hopped up onto Quinn’s palm. Bracing yourself, you held steady as your black-haired roommate strolled out of the office and onto the beach proper. The sun was blisteringly hot, but thankfully you and Quinn had both put on some sunscreen (Quinn in particular had lathered up to the extreme). There was also an occasional breeze that felt quite good, especially on your miniscule body.

Quinn strolled purposefully towards the middle tower, which you could see was not too far away. It was a standard lifeguard lookout post, about twelve feet off the ground. That was only half what you were noticing, however, as your attention had shamefully wandered back to Quinn herself. In full motion, her gigantic breasts were once more bouncing in an eye-catching manner, and her one-piece was again riding up her massive booty, revealing even more of it to the world. You were hardly the only one staring too, as Quinn was drawing the eyes of everyone she walked by.

Even still, she seemed oblivious to the adoration of the beach goers, or her own sex appeal. Your roommate and new partner merely kept sauntering on, eventually reaching the bottom of the lifeguard tower. Without a word to you, she cupped her hand and tossed you into the sky. You screamed out in surprise, flew into the air, and then crashed back down up atop the tower, landing in a slightly squishy heap on the floor of the tower.

While you reformed, Quinn effortlessly scaled the ladder up onto the tower, and stood atop it seconds later. She spotted you immediately, and scooped you back up into her hand, then placed you on the railing that served as a barrier around the top of the tower. With you in place, she sank down into the lone chair, which looked to be made of uncomfortable hard plastic. You also couldn’t help but note how Quinn’s humongous ass just barely squeezed into the chair.

After a moment of silence, you spoke up. “So…this is the tower. What do we do now?” You looked at your new partner eagerly, and though she stared back apathetically at first, your enthusiasm for your new job rubbed off just a bit on her, and she soothed her expression.

“Not much, really.” Quinn shrugged. “If someone asks for help, we help them. If someone starts screaming out in the water, we save them. Otherwise…” She gestured in a circle. “This is our post for the rest of the shift. Get comfy.”

You laughed at her blunt explanation, and sat down on the wooden railing. It was smooth wood, so no splinters, thankfully. In fact, you bet that you were more comfortable sitting on the railing than Quinn was in her seat. Though it was early in the day, the sun had been bearing down for hours, and the plastic was probably quite broiling, not to mention how the chair pinched and poked at Quinn’s hips and back. You had to believe that it was built for lifeguard’s with much less developed proportions than the black-haired giantess.

The next twenty minutes were fairly uneventful. No one asked for help, no one screamed for a savior. The sounds of the beach were just the crashing of the waves, the laughing of the beach goers, the occasional windy breeze, and the cawing of seagulls. You passed the time with Quinn by asking her about some of her favorite memories working here. She was her usual cagey self for a bit, but she began to open up more as time went by. It was pretty fun.

Eventually, the fun came to an end, and a faint voice called out from the bottom of the tower. “Hey! Miss! Can you help me find my phone? I swear, I just had it!”

Quinn hopped to her feet instantly, and walked over to the railing, peering down at the young girl who had asked for help. “Of course. I’ll be right there.” She replied. She then looked back to you, forcing you to quickly clamp your open jaw shut, hoping Quinn hadn’t just caught you watching her bubble butt jiggle and shake due to how fast she had stood up.

From the way Quinn’s eyes narrowed in annoyance, and the way she reached a hand back to readjust her wedgied one-piece, you knew that she had caught you.

Trying to not address it, you stammered out. “U-uh…want me to come with?”

Surprisingly, Quinn shook her head. “No, not this time. It’ll take too long. Hold down the fort.” She said, and then turned on her heel without another word. In one effortless motion, Quinn flipped around onto the ladder, and descended it out of sight.

All alone, you went back to scanning the beach, looking for anything that might be amiss, or anyone who might need help. There were a huge number of people at the beach, laughing, tanning, playing volleyball, swimming, and just generally enjoying themselves. For one blissful moment, you felt that this job was truly the best thing to ever happen to you, or any tiny, for that matter. It was perfect.

The illusion of perfection shattered a moment later, when a squawking seagull dive-bombed through the air, coming to a screeching landing on the tower railing right beside you. You screamed and backed away, the giant bird like a mythical creature of death at your size. The seagull eyed you curiously, and took a step closer.

Not wanting to end up the meal for some bird, you blindly leapt from the railing towards the inside of the tower, hoping it wouldn’t follow you. You hadn’t exactly looked where you were jumping, though, and you ended up landing right in the lifeguard chair. The fall slightly squished your legs, but the real thing you noticed first was the burning sensation of the hot plastic. It felt like you had landed in lava, it was almost overwhelmingly hot.

A quick glance told you that the seagull had given up and flown away, allowing you to breath a sigh of relief and focus on reforming. Your feet had flattened out and stuck to the plastic, the sticky nature of your body no doubt enhanced by how searingly hot the plastic was. Almost as overbearing as the temperature was the residual scent of Quinn’s body wash mixed with her sweat. It was both gross and appealing, and that fact made it all the weirder.

Unfortunately, you had only just reformed one foot when the worst possible thing happened: Quinn appeared, having finished helping the young girl down below. She scaled the ladder with ease, and then approached her chair. You still couldn’t move, and could only look up at her in fear as she towered above you. Nightmare scenarios of her not noticing you and sitting down ran through your mind, but she actually spotted you right away.

Hands on her hips, Quinn frowned. “…what are you doing, Hunter? That’s not your seat.”

You held up your hands, willing your right foot to stop sticking to the chair. “I-I know, I know! I’m sorry, Quinn. A seagull flew by and scared me off the railing. This is where I fell.”

Quinn’s look of contempt told you that she didn’t believe you, but there was a hint of uncertainty in her eyes. “Uh huh. You landed right where I’m supposed to sit. Honestly, I should already BE sitting, even if you are there. It’s not where you’re supposed to be, after all.”

“It’s the truth, honest! Please, Quinn, it won’t happen again!” You pleaded with your giantess lifeguard partner. “I’ll be more careful.”

An agonizingly long moment passed before Quinn closed her eyes and sighed. Reaching down, she plucked you up from her seat and returned you to the railing. She then sat back down, her butt audibly clapping against the plastic as she plopped into her chair. A grimace crossed your face, as visions of you being trapped under all of that played out in your mind.

You gave Quinn a big, genuine smile. “Thank you, Quinn. And I’m sorry.”

Quinn shook her head. “No, I believe you, about the seagull. That isn’t your fault, much. It would’ve been wrong to punish you for it.” She sighed, and you were about to speak again when she held up a finger, shushing you. “BUT, if it happens again, I won’t save you. You have to take care of yourself, Hunter, or you’ll always be as weak and frail as people say that tinies are. You won’t grow more dependable if I baby you every day during this job.”

You took stock of her words, and nodded. “Of course. You’re right.”

Quinn smiled faintly, and then was back to full business mode. “So if I see you on my chair again before I sit down…” She shrugged. “Don’t let me find you on my chair, is what I’m saying.”

“Roger that!” You saluted, earning a barely audible chuckle from the black-haired giantess. Then, the two of you went back to looking out over the beach. Your shift as partners continued.

For that reason when you heard a woman’s voice behind you say, “Ugh, finally an open space” you whipped your head around and knew that she was headed straight for you. After years of fighting from a student, now graduate, at a college called Middletown University that goes by the name of Amy Baker, a law concerning the usage and rights of tiny men as items had been passed. You heard all about it on the news when it first passed. Amy Baker fought for the idea that men should be able to choose to be used as whatever they wanted, not just forced to live as miniature regular people. They could pursue getting legally licensed for use by a specific woman or in general, as long as all parties involved were willing. The law stated that any licensed man must still be recognized as a human being, no matter what condition they were currently in or what they were being used for. The process in its entirety was quite rare, with a very small percentage of the population actually going through with it, but nonetheless it made nationwide headlines.

It was seen by this Amy Baker herself as a landmark day for tiny men’s rights. She thought that men who were okay with being used should be respected and accepted for doing so. It was a sweet idea, really, but in reality it was easily abused by women who sought far worse fates for the tiny men that surrounded them. A few cases of men who got their Usage License for the right reasons would find their way to news stations every once in a while. A husband signing up for use from his wife and daughter because he didn’t have enough money to buy them Christmas presents would warm the hearts of those who heard of it. But just as often as you heard good stories about Baker’s Law, you also heard the opposite. Men were often threatened into pursuing their Usage License, or outright sold themselves into it in hopes of making a quick buck. *crack*

The heat and the pressure underneath this woman was nearly too much for you, buried under her butt. After sometime.. you coulndt say if it were 10 min or 1h her butt sweat began dripping from her cheek, forming a layer on her butt and yourself. Especially only for the profit of such an unpleasant woman" you wondered.

"Whait SWEAT that's it! I can try to wriggle around the next time she shifts her position and with a little luck I can escape due the layer of liquid around me! Or maybe dig my way out of here, right beside the sand doesnt seem so compressed as it is here" you thougt.

After some time the woman did shift around for some reason. The silent *plop* of a sunscreen bottle delivered the explanation why luck was on your side. But it didnt matter to you: You wriggled your whole body to move a little forward. Step by step you moved forward like a snail, unfortunatly for you was the fact that you were just as slow as the animal. Finally you arrived at the section of loose sand to dig your way to freedom. When you looked up you could see the huge ass crack of your (former?) captive. You tried to get the fear out of your head, cause it would only lead to freeze you because of that feeling.

"Now lets do this" you said to yourself, trying to motivate you and getting the fear out of your head. Suddenly you heard a quiet but noticable voice:
"Hello? I mmmpf HELP!"

The next moment you looked up and saw the butt looming over you. You had to think quickly: "Ok I dont know what is happening here but first i need to get away from this ground zero, if i make it I can solve the riddle of the thong-mans voice" you cursed yourself for the term "thong- guy" but since that stupid law passed the supreme court it was all around the news and media in general.

After your work was done and you felt safe enough to look back you realized that you indeed made it out of the danger zone. Exhausted you allowed yourself a moment of rest,celebrating your victory and taking a deep breath of fresh air.
After 5 min of resting and reforming more and more you were nearly in your original human form,which filled you with joy and relief. Mostly because it wouldnt be the first time for you getting away from one danger and stumbling in the next.
Speaking of danger: " I have to solve this stupid situation with this woman without getting squashed again you " you told yourself. "But what about the guy in her back... Was he really calling for help or was it just the pressure and heat which made me hallucinate?" you wondered.

While thinking about this occurence under the butt your feet finally plopped back in their normal form and you were able again to walk and solve the problem with the lifeguard stand and maybe solve the riddle of the voice.

You slowly approached the woman, who seemed to read a book with her sunglasses on and enjoying her time. What angered you additionally to your broken work station was the fact that she does not seem to be concerned about what you two talked about before, now almost her whole body was in the tiny section.

"Ähm EXCUSE ME ,MISS?" you shouted up to her.
Confused she took her sunglasses down a little to see who was talking to her and finally she cought sight of you.

What she said was making a very angry and much less careful.
"I'M THE LIFEGUARD HERE AND YOU ARE A GUEST OF THIS BEACH. I REMIND YOU THAT YOU HAVE TO FOLLOW THE ORDERS OF THE STAFF WITHOUT EXCEPTION!" you screamed at her full of anger.
At first she looked shocked at your outburst but soon she just smirked while shrugging her shoulders. She doesnt seem to be impressed and answered with a slight giggle :
"Well Mr. Lifeguard, of course I follow the orders of the beach. We talked about my rights...aaahm his rights to be in this tiny section."

with both their signatures.

"Well, Well, Well we have a very dedicated young lifeguard here it seems, always seeking for the wellbeing of his customers." she said while searching in her beach bag. After a little time of searching, she took a very creasy piece of paper out of her bag, which was nearly not readable due of its bad state. On one corner you could see a big coffee spot in the middle there was something which looked like ketchup.
"This is the Usage License for my little thongy- Tony here", she said while pulling on her thong to emphazise her power over him and smirking at you.
When you looked on it you could only read that her name was Rachel Wood and that her part of the document had a signature as it should be. But the other half of the paper, where his information should be was all dirty and nearly not readable. At first you thought you would have lost again against this woman but fortunatly for you, you realized that there was no signature to see under the coffee spot.
"I'm sorry mam it seems there is no signature of a Tony on this license which makes the whole document wortless, legally speaking of course" you said smiling and drunk of your own self esteem. " I will have to call my boss to further inspect this anomaly, I'm sure when we ask Tony he will explain everything" you said
In the blink of an eye the woman grabed you with light speed and you found yourself right in front of her angry face.
"Oh I dont think so my dear. Do you see this woman there?" she asked pointing at a huge curvy black woman in a skimpy blue bikini walking towards your spot and waiving with her arms to greet. Even from this perspective you could see that her assets , especially her butt were giant in comparison to Rachels
"This is Isabella, my dearest friend and by coincidence she is a notary which can confirm my story about tonys free choice to be a thong for me. " she explained to you with a huge smile on her face.
"She was responsible for all the paper work I had to do before I could get Tony where I wanted. So here is the deal little man either you stay silent about all of these accusations with the tower and tony, or maybe a new Usage License appears with your name on it and I promise you that the "For everyone to use"- Box will be crossed. I'm sure Isabella would gladly be of help for your wish. And the way I see it you would also make a great thong but I guess you will be the wrong size for a woman like me" she said with a telling expression on her face while turning her eyes to Isabell.

Now you were in a double windmill. either you give in and wont have an explanation for the lost tower or you will have to deal with a corrupt notary and her evil friend leading to a Usage Licence for yourself. "What shall I do either way I'm fucked up, the question is... is my well being more important than tonys? Noone will investigate his status as a thong without you.

You had lived a very fortunate protected life up until now. Other tiny men, like little Tony for example, weren't so lucky. 115321122.content:
You were overwhelmed upon realizing the bluff that you just laid down. But even though it was your first day, it was your duty as a lifeguard to protect the lives of any tiny guys at the beach. It would have weighed heavily on your conscience if you just abandoned him to be imprisoned in this arrogant woman’s ass. Clearly you figured that she, with the help of her friend, had the ability to create counterfeit usage licenses based on the muffled screams of the guy acting as her thong.

But even knowing that fact, you would never be able to forgive yourself if you let this fellow guy Tony suffer in his current predicament. You cursed your stupidly strong sense of empathy, knowing that like always it would only lead you to trouble.

“I’m sorry miss, but I just can’t let this slide. This usage license clearly isn’t official and you know it.” You said up to her, still pretending to find this mysterious panic button that you claimed to have on you. From in between two of her fingers, pinching you like a twig, it was admittedly hard to feign confidence. You saw the malice growing in this giantess’s eyes as you challenged her, strengthening the pit of nerves that you felt in your stomach. You knew firsthand that directly challenging a normal sized girl as a one inch tall guy was consistently the dumbest choice that you could make, but for some reason you just couldn’t let this situation go.

To your absolute surprise Rachel opened up her fist and simply dropped you onto the sand below! You landed with a thud inaudible to any regular sized people, immediately trying to straighten and reform the legs that she squished in her grip. Nevertheless, it seemed like your plan had worked!

“Fine, you little tattletale. Messing with you isn’t worth the risk of you actually calling over someone who has real power.” Rachel said while gathering her things! It seemed like you had actually won your battle! Your confidence soared briefly, thinking on your feet actually got you out of a jam for once. But then Rachel continued, “My friend and I will find somewhere else on this stupid beach to tan, but not before we find another lifeguard and ask allllll about you. I’m sure that my notary friend finding out all of your personal details won’t end up badly for you at all!” Rachel’s indirect threat struck fear further into your heart as she then leaned down, lowered her sunglasses, and looked directly into your eyes. Her enormous breasts threatened to spill out of her bikini top, but you were far too terrified to even pay attention to them at a time like this.

“I know you think you might have won or something, twerp, but you didn’t. Not only am I not giving up my little thong, but let’s just say your life is going to get a lot more difficult in the near future.” Rachel smirked before finishing, “Even though I may not be the one dishing out the punishment to your tiny ass, you better pray that the other women in your life really like you, because if they don’t… well you’ll find out!” As she concluded her speech, Rachel stood up and shot you a final wink before spinning around and walking away. She signaled to her friend Isabella that they would need to find a new spot, prompting a quick look of confusion from the woman before she simply shrugged her shoulders and kept walking. As the two women walked further into the distance you cursed the sad life of that guy, Tony, watching as he was chewed up between the callous woman’s butt cheeks. You took another moment to assess your surroundings and you lamented the state of the men’s beach section. The simple action of that jerk of a woman sitting down in the sand practically wiped out everything that was set up to help you.

Looking back once more to make sure that the two menaces of women were actually leaving, you gulped with fear upon remembering Rachel’s threat. If her friend really was a notary like she said, could she really write a usage license for you without your consent?! As you had that thought your eyes found the two, now a good distance away, and they seemed to be talking to Brigitte. Rachel clearly pointed directly at you and the tiny guy’s section, sharing a few words with your boss of all people. Your eyes opened wide, as you finally saw Brigitte split from the two immediately begin walking towards you. Now panicked, you frantically wondered what that malicious woman may have said to your boss. If she bad mouthed you enough you wouldn’t be surprised if you were fired on the spot!

Brigitte’s long powerful steps covered the vast stretch of beach between you and her in no time. What may have been a multiple day hike for you was only a minute or so for the strong giantess. Your nerves were about to overwhelm you as Brigitte walked straight up to you, surprisingly noticing you next to the remnants of your shattered lifeguard tower.

“Hunter!” She exclaimed, intimidating you once more. But suddenly she broke into a huge smile, “Those two women over there just raved to me about how helpful you were to them! They said they really appreciated your hard work and were asking all about you! They even asked for your home address which I thought was a bit strange at first, but they said they wanted to send you a gift or something. Either way, keep up the good work. You’ve already surpassed my expectations for you, and the busy part of the day should just about be ending so the rest of the day should be a breeze.” Brigitte shot you a big thumbs up before turning and walking away, presumably to check on Quinn and the other lifeguards.

You couldn’t believe your ears. Not only did Rachel and Isabella not try to get you fired, but they actually praised you. On one hand you were happy, but on the other hand you felt incredibly uneasy with how that whole situation went down. What else did that crazy girl and her friend have in store for you?

The rest of your day went miraculously smoothly. True to Brigitte’s claim, the rush slowed down significantly, a welcome change for you. You sadly had to sit in the sand since your lifeguard tower was destroyed, but somehow no other life-threatening events happened at all until the end of your shift. At the end of the day, Quinn picked you up and took you home, carrying you in the pocket of her bag once more. Part of you wanted to talk to her on the trip back but you didn’t want to push the envelope with your new roommate. She seemed a bit standoffish, even though you could tell that there was more to her than that, but either way risking annoying her didn’t seem like the best move.

Your luck continued into the evening, as you and your three roommates ordered chinese food and had a remarkably unremarkable dinner. Nobody slurped you up along with their noodles, or threw you into the trash accidentally, or even squashed you at all! You had a genuinely nice night, each telling one another about their respective jobs. It was fantastic to say the least. Even when the three girls left you downstairs without figuring out your sleeping arrangements just like the night before, you didn’t mind one bit. You had hope that you would figure it out soon enough, but until then the cushioned couch was more than sufficient. Eventually, you drifted off into dreamland, thinking about how your one inch tall life might turn out normal just yet.

You awoke in the morning to Morgan standing over you, holding a letter with your name on it. You rubbed the sleep out of your eyes and looked closer and saw that it was stamped with the logo of the C.T.C or the Center for Tiny Citizenship!

“This looks serious, Hunter. You want me to open it for you?” Morgan said, with evident concern in her voice. Having just woke up, you simply nodded. Morgan dug her finger into the envelope and gently opened it. When she pulled out the two of you recognized the paper immediately. Tinies and regular sized girls alike knew what it was upon first glance, considering it was likely the single most impactful law that had been passed in the last half century. Both you and Morgan’s eyes went wide, as she read out loud “Usage License for General Use… Hunter Woods” Morgan spun the paper around immediately you saw a clearly forged version of your signature, along with the words General Use instead of a specific woman’s name on the opposite side. Down at the bottom you saw in fine print, “notarized by Isabella Brooks”. Your entire world was shattered in an instant. Those crazy women did it. Not only did you have an official usage license, but a General Use one to boot. This meant that any woman could use you without needing documentation of their own. Effectively, if a cruel enough woman found out about this she could destroy your life as a human being in an instant and subject you to a life of use.

Not being able to handle this atomic bomb of news so early in the morning, you felt yourself get light headed and faint!

When you awoke soon after, what was happening?

(Some/all of the girls all take a sick day and take you straight to the C.T.C. to get to the bottom of your random Usage License)

(You wake up in Quinn’s bag, with her taking you to work just like yesterday since she didn’t want to be late. Little did you know but your employer gets automatically notified if a tiny guy acquires a usage license while currently employed. Brigitte may force Quinn to use you as a swimsuit to replace her too-small uniform)

(You wake up to a knock on the door and it is a relative who you haven’t seen in a while, eager to use you)

1153211221.content:
You awake to the sight of Morgan’s concerned face staring down at you with a look of concern, which softened when she saw you moving.
“Avery, Quinn! He’s awake!” Her face was soon flanked by the equally enormous faces of Quinn and Avery.
You saw the look of concern on Avery’s face change to her usual carefree smile once she saw you were awake.
Quinn was showing her usual apathetic expression, but you could see the worry in her eyes.

You suddenly became aware of the sounds of many different conversations coming from all around you. This made you take a look around and you and realise that you were currently on a bus, with you and your roommates occupying the back seats.
You looked back to your roommates in confusion before Avery, noticing the confused look on your face, spoke up.
“We all took the day off to take you to the C.T.C and help you get rid of that general usage license!” Avery’s exuberant personality and loud voice drew the looks of a few of the other women on the bus, many of their eyes drawing to you at the mention of your usage license. Several of them gave you flirty looks, most of them gave you looks that made you very uncomfortable. You were speechless as Avery broadcasted to the whole bus that they could freely use you and the law would be on their side.
Morgan and Quinn quickly shushed Avery who didn’t even seem to realise what she had done wrong, but the damage was already done. You could feel many sets of eyes on you, including the bus driver, who you could see stealing glances back at your group in her rear view mirror.
“What? It’s not as if anyone could take Hunter from the three of us, we just need to keep an eye on him,” Avery huffed defensively as she saw the irritated looks on the other girl’s faces because of her outburst.
“So Hunter, the plan is to walk in to the C.T.C building and demand a meeting with the woman who notarised your license and try to straighten this out. If not we can try and threaten legal action against them, although that might be a difficult route since these usage licenses are kinda hard to get rid of from what I hear. Plus none of us really have that much money to pay a good lawyer, so let’s hope it doesn’t come to that,” Morgan’s eyes seemed to sadden as she explained how difficult that getting rid of this license could be. You felt yourself falling deeper into panic the more you thought about it as well. The only thing keeping you even slightly calm was the fact that all three of your roommates were here to protect you.
“Our stop should be coming up soon, so sit tight Hunter,” Avery gave you a small smile, which then faded to her usual neutral expression once she realised she was smiling.
The bus journey passed uneventfully, the chatter between your roommates drifted away from your situation, which helped ease your nerves. However as the girls chatted you couldn’t shake the feeling of several sets of eyes still on you, many of the women on the bus hadn’t taken their eyes off of you since Avery’s outburst, even the bus driver was still stealing glances at you when she wasn’t focusing on the road. Eventually Quinn and Morgan also noticed the stares, both of them giving you a look of reassurance as Avery continued to chat.

Eventually the bus started to approach the stop closest to the C.T.C office building. Quinn, Morgan and Avery stood up, with Morgan at the front holding you.
Many of the women who were watching you lost interest when they saw you leaving the bus, except for one, the driver.
As your group walked through the isle you saw her glance at you and smirk. Before you could even contemplate what was happening she pressed on the breaks, jolting the bus to a halt in the stop. Morgan stumbled forward with you in her hand as she tried to keep her grip on you. Does she succeed?

1) Yes, Morgan manages to keep a hold of you and you all get off the bus as quickly as possible. Morgan and Quinn glaring at the bus driver as you do.

2) No, and you go flying forward towards the bus driver, exactly as she planned.

3) No, you go flying backwards towards one of the other passengers, or towards Quinn or Avery.

11532112212.content:
As you flew from Morgan’s grip time seemed to slow for you. You looked around the bus to see all the women who had been staring at you excitedly when they heard about your usage license begin to shift in their seats in anticipation now that they saw you were separated from your roommates. You saw Morgan’s panicked face as she realised she had lost her grip of you, but didn’t see exactly where in the air you were, or where you were flying towards.
Speaking of which, you turned around to see your destination. You could see the eyes of the bus driver in the rear view mirror tracking your movement, she looked ecstatic that her plan had worked as you were now sailing through the air in a perfect arc towards her. You saw a few of the women in between Morgan and the front of the bus reach up to try to catch you, and a few of them come close, their fingers brushing against you. You yelped every time one of their hands swept past you, but your fear of them seemed misplaced, because the real danger was where you were about to land. The bus driver eagerly watched you arc through the air, sailing over her head and landing with a barely audible splat at her feet, just in front of the pedals her feet were currently resting on. As you took a second to get your bearings you managed to take in the appearance of your new tormentor.
Even from your perspective on the floor you could see she was heavyset, she seemed to be incredibly pear shaped, you could see the sides of her ass peeking out over the sides of her chair, as well as her pudgy stomach hanging over her belt slightly. Her face showed some signs of age, you’d guess she was around 45 or so, and her brown, slightly greying hair was cut short and pulled back in a bun. You managed to catch a glimpse of her name tag, which told you her name was Janice, before your sight of her was blocked by the sole of her shoe. The shoe stomped down on you and she twisted her heel on top of you, grinding you into the treads of her shoes. You silently screamed, your head too mangled for you to actually be able to make any noice, as this cruel woman ground you into the sole of her shoe like a used cigarette. Once she was sure you were stuck in the treads of her shoe she lifted her foot, carrying you with it back onto the break pedal, resting it there while she turned to your roommates as the bus doors swung open.
“Alright girls, this is your stop. I’ve got a schedule to keep so if you could be quick,” Janice spoke with an impatience that could probably be interpreted as her simply being frustrated with her job, but you knew she wanted your roommates off the bus before they discovered your location.
“Hold on a minute, I just dropped our tiny guy we had with us, give us a minute to find him please!” You heard the panicked voice of Morgan pleading with Janice. “We can’t just leave him on the bus.”
“Sorry girls but I’m already late as it is. Tell you girls what, I’ll give you a minute or two but after that I really need you guys off here. My boss has been giving me grief about running late all the time, you understand don’t you?” Janice would normally have just driven on if a passenger was refusing to get off the bus, but she really didn’t want the three girls on any longer than they had to be, otherwise they could possibly discover you.

With that time limit in place, the girls hurried in trying to locate you. Morgan knew you had been thrown forward, she just wasn’t sure exactly where you went. Quinn had saw a few of the women further down reaching up for you, but wasn’t exactly sure if one of them had caught you or not. With those two facts in mind, your roommates began to search for you. Morgan went down to the front of the bus to look for you there, Quinn began interrogating the girls who she saw reaching for you, and Avery began looking on the floor and under the seats for you.
Seeing the girls so organised and efficiently searching for you worried Janice, she expected them to panic and not manage to search the whole are you could have been in. Her nerves caused her to absentmindedly grind her heels into the floor, further compacting you between the grooves of her shoes. She silently prayed that they would run out of time before they started to suspect her. Do they discover you?

1) Yes, and they manage to convince Janice to give you up.
2) Yes, but you are either too crushed into the grooves of her shoe for them to recover you, or Janice uses your usage license as defence to keep you.
3) No, and they have to leave the bus and go to the C.T.C building without you, potentially making removing the license much more difficult.

For the next two minutes you suffered through being ground further into the treads of the bus driver’s shoes, as she tried to better conceal you from your roommate’s frantic searching which was getting closer and closer to your hiding place under her foot. You silently cried out to them, but your mangled body could make no sounds.

She quickly hid her grin, before turning to Morgan with a look of faux concern.
“Sorry girls, times up. Sorry but I’ve got a schedule to keep,” she was straining to keep her grin from reemerging, but must have done a bad job at it because Morgan looked at her with confusion.
“Why are you in such a rush to have us off this bus? Most drivers would have just shrugged and drove on with us still on board, are you hiding something?” Hearing Morgan say this, Quinn and Avery approached.

She lifted her foot up and began prying you loose with her fingernail. There was a brief moment that you feared she wouldn’t actually be able to get you out, but that fear was placated as you felt your body slip out from between the tight treads.
Your body slipped out as a long, thin piece of string, having been tightly compacted into a single tread of her shoe. One of your eyes was still visible so you could look up at your would be kidnapper. Her face had an expression similar to a child who got caught shoplifting, as she glumly handed your stringy form over to Quinn, who wordlessly grabbed you from the bus driver with a cold glare.
Your three giantess friends exited the bus without another word, and it pulled away, leaving you all to look up at the C.T.C office building. As you were now in the shadow of the building, knowing that the woman who had caused you so much hardship was inside and that you would have to see her soon, you shuddered.
Quinn, feeling your shivering body vibrate against her hand, looked down at you reassuringly before looking up at the building again and walking towards it, determined to help you out of this situation.

As you looked at the other people standing in the line you noticed a similar trend between all of them. All of them either had tiny men with them or had some kind of tan clothing on display. You started considering your own situation and wondered how many of the men here had been assigned usage licenses against their will. Even further how many had their licenses assigned by the very woman you were trying to speak to, Isabella.
Baker’s Law, in your opinion, had done more harm than good. The woman who managed to push it through seemed to have noble intentions, but the law she helped create may very well have ruined your life, and possibly the lives of many of the other guys in this room.
Deep in thought you strangely seemed to blame Amy Baker more than Isabella herself, which you realised was stupid and shook yourself out of it. Looking back around the room you saw that the line had moved up a lot while you were thinking and you and Quinn were almost at the front. Realising this, you began to panic slightly, the thought of seeing Isabella again making you incredibly anxious.
Seeing your distress, Quinn looked down at you.
“Listen Hunter, I know you’re worried about this, but you need to get your head in the game here. We’ll be here to back you up but in the end it’s you that’s in this situation so you are going to have to put in the work to get out of it,” Quinn’s small speech knocked you out of your doom and gloom attitude.
“Yeah you’re right Quinn, thanks.”
Quinn gave a small nod before continuing, “And don’t worry, we’ll be in there with you to make sure she doesn’t do anything underhanded... you’re a pretty nice guy and I don’t want to see anything bad happen to you if I can help it.”
You were about to reply to Quinn, but the line suddenly moved forward and Quinn was called forward to the reception desk.

Quinn approached the desk, where a young woman sat, appearing bored out of her mind. As Quinn began to speak to her you could see her eyes drifting to the clock on the far wall every now and then, clearly counting the minutes till her shift ends.
“I’m here with my friend Hunter Woods, he was issued a general usage license against his will and we need to speak to the notary who issued it, Isabella Brooks.”
The bored receptionist looked up at Quinn, obviously disinterested in this conversation mere moments into it.

“... Ok give me a minute, I’ll check if she’s in right now...”

1) “...Yup she’s got an available slot now, you and your friends can go on in.” You all go in to meet with Isabella.
2) “...Ah yes, she’s expecting you, go on in.” Isabella has had time to prepare, how will this affect your chances of removing the license.
