You awoke, and after taking a moment to breath deeply and calm yourself down, you could hear the faint sounds of laughter and waves crashing, and realized that you were once more in Quinn’s bag, being carried along to work at Sanderson Beach. Sure enough, after a minute, your pocket was unzipped, and Quinn lifted you out.

Looking down at you, Quinn noted your shaken expression and frowned. “You’re really worried about this, huh?” She asked, a hint of genuine compassion in her voice. “Look, Hunter, I think that License stuff is bullshit and frustrating. I knew a few tinies once who signed up because they were low on cash, and the last I ever saw them, this bratty cheerleader at our high school had them glued to her boobs like pasties for over four months. Of course, according to law, it was all ‘legal’.”

You paled at Quinn’s story, and began quivering in fear. “Y-you don’t think…that…” You began, but Quinn cut you off.

“Hell no, Hunter. You’re under my care while we’re hear at the beach.” Quinn’s expression was blazing with righteous fury. “Until this License mess is sorted, I’m telling Brigitte that you WILL NOT leave my sight each day. I swear.”

Your accelerating panic attack slowed down, and you flashed Quinn a grateful smile. To your surprise, she actually returned it, and it was one of the few times you could recall seeing her actually smile so far.

Quinn began walking, and resumed talking as she did so. “In fact, we’re headed to Brigitte’s office right now. She requested to speak to us, and told me not to change for some reason. Maybe she finally has a replacement for my too-small bikini. Regardless, I’m letting her know that your safety comes first. She’ll be understanding, count on it.”

“Thank you for doing all of this, Quinn. It means a lot.” You said to her, and though she didn’t respond with more than a curt nod, you could’ve sworn the lightest trace of pink flushed her cheeks for a split second before disappearing.

When the two of you reached Brigitte’s office, you found your new boss seated at her desk, and frowning at her computer. As Quinn walked in, Brigitte glanced up, and her frown only deepened. As she locked eyes with you, the light in her eyes dimmed a bit. You weren’t totally sure, but it seemed as if she was displaying signs of…anxiety? Apprehension? Guilt, maybe?

Quinn took a seat in front of Brigitte’s desk, and placed you down on the edge of her boss’s desk. Noting her superior’s apparent unease, Quinn furrowed her brow. “What’s up, Brigitte? You wanted to see us? Truth is, I had something to say to.”

Brigitte’s eyes widened, and she breathed out, seemingly releasing a breath she’d been holding for a while. “O-oh? Is that right? Go ahead, shoot. I’ll…uh…explain myself after you speak.”

Quinn shrugged. “Okay, sure. Basically, I just wanted to request Hunter as my partner for the next few weeks. I wanted him up in the lifeguard stand with me, or by my side during patrols.” Your black-haired roommate glanced at you, then back to Brigitte. “He had a…less than enjoyable first day, and would feel safer as close to me as possible.”

Hearing the phrase ‘close to me as possible’ caused Brigitte to shift uncomfortably in her chair, and the redhead seemed to be at a loss for words for a moment until finally composing herself. Looking at her computer, then at you, and finally at Quinn, she spoke again. “Well, that shouldn’t be too much of a problem…in a way.”

You spoke up. “That’s great, thank you!”

Brigitte bit her lip, and waited an uncomfortably long time before speaking again. “See, thing is…I actually got an email late last night. I checked again to make sure it was real this morning. From what I can see on my end, Hunter has applied for, and been accepted for a General Use License. All the paperwork is here on the screen, and legit.”

You felt your fears rising, and you stammered out a reply. “W-well, th-that’s not actually…”

Quinn, unintentionally, cut off your explanation with her own. “No, ma’am, Hunter was…”

Brigitte silenced both of you by raising your hand. “Look, guys. I’m sorry, but it doesn’t matter. From your expressions, it seems like maybe this was all a big mishap, but the paperwork is genuine. This License has to be treated as real and applicable to any foreseeable situation. Until it can be officially revoked…which I hear is a huge pain.”

Your giantess partner seethed in her chair, angry at the women from yesterday, not Brigitte, who’s hands were tied. “Just because the License is real…for now…doesn’t mean we have to do anything with–”

“Speaking of that…” Brigitte leaned back in her chair, and pulled an envelope out of a drawer. She dropped the envelope onto her desk in front of Quinn, letting the contents spill out. Inside the envelope were about thirty little slips of folded paper. “…I found notes like these in the Sanderson Beach tips and complaints box all this past week. These thirty are from yesterday ALONE.”

Quinn, confused, sifted through the pieces of paper, pausing to read a few. After glancing at them, a full, beet red blush ignited in her cheeks, and her eyes widened. You’d never seen Quinn look so taken aback by anything before. She was utterly speechless.

Brigitte sighed. “Ten of these paper slips are from beach goers complaining about your risqué uniform, Quinn. Mostly families and older people saying that you’re setting a bad example for children. The other twenty slips are, frankly, quite lecherous. Perverts and the like complimenting your…ahem…‘crazy hella fine ass’ and ‘bouncing bubble butt’. It’s pretty gross.”

To your amazement, Quinn actually sank into her seat from embarrassment. “I-I can’t help it. I’m just shaped this way…AND it’s that dumb suit’s fault. It’s too small!” Quinn was a bit frantic now, probably trying too hard to save face. It was almost cute, if you didn’t have a growing sense of dread building inside of you over what was about to happen.

“Exactly my point, Quinn.” Brigitte nodded, and she began to slowly move forward, leaning over her desk. Momentarily distracted by your boss’ huge, firm breasts and lean abdomen, you were caught off guard as the towering redhead scooped you up into her palm and held you tightly. The action also snapped Quinn out of her flustered spiral, and she sat up attentively.

“Wait, Brigitte, what are you…” You tried to say, before being silenced by Brigitte gently but forcibly smushing your head flat.

Brigitte shrugged her shoulders. “I don’t know all the details here, but this seems like the win-win situation to me. Hunter as a General Use License now, making it perfectly legal for him to serve his position here at Sanderson Beach by being molded into replacement bikini bottoms for you. Just as long as it takes until we get a new, proper fitting suit for you, Quinn. Besides, the General Use License, when used in a work setting, ups his hourly pay. Again, win-win!”

Quinn was floored. “Wha…Brigitte! He’s a living being like us. He doesn’t want to be my bikini bottoms!” Quinn paused, and began blushing again. “And I don’t want to have to wear Hunter for–”

“Look, his License says what his License says.” Brigitte frowned. “This might be weird for you at first, but you just need to change your thinking. By law, he’s property now, remember?”

Quinn’s eyes nearly bulged from her skull, and she sneered at her boss. “You can’t seriously believe that?”

Brigitte shook her head. “No, I like that little dude, but it’s factual law. Not only do we need to abide by his License, but this will also solve your dress code issue. No more rude comments or worrying complaints from beach goers, and no more discomfort for you. I mean, I’m sure you know how stretchy tinies are. He’ll fit you well.”

“Ma’am…”

“At the end of the day…I’m your boss, Quinn. I’m telling you this is going to happen.” The giantess redhead looked sullen for a moment. “I’m sorry, but all you could do is quit to avoid this. Even still, Hunter would remain employed here, and I’m sure his License would be useful for other purposes.”

Your giantess roommate looked utterly defeated, and she sank back in defeat. Sparing you a heart wrenching look of dismayed acceptance, she nodded at Brigitte’s proposal. A huge smile came back to the normally energetic redhead’s beautiful face.

“Great! Awesome!” Brigitte smiled. “This’ll be over before you know it, Quinn. As soon as we get a replacement suit for you, Hunter is off the hook. And, as soon as his License is revoked, if that’s what the little dude wants, he’s free to go back to normal work.” Brigitte began flattening you by clenching her palm. “Besides, you two get what you wanted, right? He’ll be ‘as close to you as possible’, remember? It’s perfect!”

Crunched up in Brigitte’s hand, you felt your spirits fall to despairing lows. This day had truly become the nightmare those two evil women from yesterday had promised it would be. Your License in full effect, you were nothing but property by law now. Brigitte’s last statement, innocent as it had been, stung particularly harsh. You had wanted to partner with Quinn to avoid THIS exact scenario, but fate had screwed you over in the end.

Was she boiling her foot in onions every night! your eyes started to water from the smell, as she slid you into the shoe you noticed your face part was in the heel allowing you to see out but you could feel your legs were bent back so only your crotch was probably under the toes but your stomach took up it's place under the ball of her foot. "This is gonna be the best, I can't wait to try you out! I wonder what I'll like you best as, I know you put down that you loved everything so I guess I just gotta break you in." Hearing her causally talk about how she was excited to use you and 'break you in' was almost as bad as seeing the damp 'white' sock replace her face, the heavy use was evident as the sock had obviously been worn thin around the ball and heel and the dark spots indicating where her toes were. She was moving at normal speed but it almost seemed to slide over you in slow motion, the toes touching down on your tongue and then dragging all the way to the end of the shoe leaving behind a layer of filth and sweat mixed together the salt and dirt taste causing you to convulse slightly until her foot fully filled the shoe and sealed you in. She must have felt it though because she said something you couldn't hear from inside the shoe.

Now with her foot fully inserted the heat started to turn up and the excess sweat from her sock was squeezing out with every step and absorbing directly into your body. You tried to focus on a plan to contact Norah or... anyone to explain what had happened to her, you feared that if you didn't it would take a very long time for you to make any progress. You were floored as soon as she started moving though, every step broke your focus as her heel squashed your head and then she rolled up to the ball and stomped your stomach, and she was just walking out of the office. She stopped moving for a moment and you could hear Isabella's voice, you only got a couple words but then you heard Norah respond "Insole." and then Isabella's full belted laugh as Norah started moving again.

It was obvious she was outside immediately, the sauna inside her shoe turned into a full blown steam cooker and then after a small pause, probably to put on music, She took off in a blur of motion to your perspective. There was no more time to think, only brace for the next step as each lift off 'knocked the wind' out of you and you started actively trying to drink the sweat as you were sure it was filling up the shoe somehow. If you could have you'd be screaming your head off, the experience even worse than you had even thought. despite how clumsy she was you had never actually been trapped inside of Norah's shoes before and having it now was not giving you a good feeling about your tenure as Norah's personal tiny if she continued not even trying to listen to you.

Time was a blur, you were sure that several hours had passed as the steps started to blend together and finally your body had absorbed enough from the socks (even if you couldn't taste anything but foot anymore) that you didn't feel like you were drowning in sweat. In actuality it had only been about fifteen minutes, your delirious stomped on mind was begging for some sort of even futile release. You tried screaming and found that it made your mind feel a little better to shout in frustration and so you continued to do it, causing your body to slightly vibrate against the assaulting foot.

Norah was bopping to her favorite workout play list when she felt the little buzz from her shoe, it felt kind of nice like it relaxed her foot a little. "Aww Hunter, you were already doing such a great job as an insole supporting me and soaking up all my sweat, isn't it exhausting shaking like that just for a little massage? Then again you did gift yourself to me so I guess putting in your full effort to make me satisfied is something you'd do." Not that you could hear but Norah was musing to herself. At some point you gave up on screaming having been screamed out but by then Norah had stopped jogging, you looked up at your new Owner... your Aunt as her face hovered about the shoe for a moment, you were already so exhausted from the jog you were having trouble telling if she was looking at you until she said...
1153211223312.title: Norah's Hunter Insole

choices: You slip, falling to the floor somewhere.
Norah fidgets, causing you to get squashed in between her thighs
11532112233123.content:
Gazing up at this carefree giantess you legally belonged to, you expected to see a ceiling indicating she had taken you inside. Instead you saw past her joyous expression only to see the bright blue sky overhead. You wondered why she had stopped if she wasn't home yet but as if reading your mind, correctly for once, she seemed to answer your question calling down, "Phew, alright Hunter, that's about half way! I've gotta say I can already tell this is going to be one of my favorite things to use you as. I mean, usually I have to stop at this bench to air out and cool down my feet since by now they're usually soaked; but thanks to you I can just change what side you're on and save some time!"

You had just gotten to the point where the sweat was manageable within Norah's shoe, and now you were about to be subjected to another one? Your body put up no resistance as Norah pried you off the bottom of the inside of her shoe and shoved you into it's twin. You squeezed into the sweltering tomb with a squelch as the sweat that was already pooling at the bottom sloshed with your addition.

With your face still tucked in her heel, you saw Norah giving herself a tiny massage with an investigative look. "Wow! The foot you were with a minute ago is only damp, yet my other one is totally drenched! I mean, really, see for yourself!" Norah hovered her uncleaned foot over your prison, wiggling her toes for effect as she showcased just how much worse for wear it was without your assistance. Clenching her foot, Norah's sock was squeezed into the crevices of her toes, causing a toxic downpour to fall free from it's fabric, only to land directly onto your exposed face.

"Oopsie! That was a bit more dramatic flair than I was going for!" Norah's giggles provided a tormenting backdrop as you fought the salty stinging in your crushed eyes. Actually peering down at you, Norah saw your grimacing expression and issued a response, "Aww, am I chatting too much? Or do ya just miss my warm foot~? I'm sorry, honey, let's get back on the road!"

Not wasting anymore time, Norah tucked her foot back into her shoe and gave it a few good stamps to make sure it was nice and snug. Not needing any approval from the little pad cushioning her foot, the gorgeous redhead went back into her jog down the road, totally oblivious to the torment each and every step was inflicting on her little nephew she loved so much.

A mere fifteen minutes later, an eternity when spent bearing Norah's weight and the burden of soaking up her fresh sweat, your aunt was seated on her couch attempting to cool down after such a grueling run. Wanting to get your approval after such a good first use of you legally as hers, Norah untied her shoes and grabbed each heel, pulling them off and letting them thud lazily on the floor.

Picking up the one she thought housed you, Norah was puzzled to not see a smiling face beaming up at her. Instead she just saw the usual bottom of her shoe. "I was sure he was in this one..." Norah mumbled before checking her other shoe. "Maybe he got jammed inside?" Norah leaned in to get a closer look towards the front of the shoe only to get hit with a hot wave of her own odor. "Oh my! Why on Earth would he sign up to be put in there?" She was blowing away the stench with her hand before a lightbulb went off in her head as she answered herself, "Wow, he really loves me that much that he'd deal with all this just to make my run a little easier..."

Norah was restraining cries of joy at how she must be the luckiest woman to ever live when she felt a familiar tingling against the bottom of her foot. Your feeblest attempts at getting her attention seemed to pay off as her weight came off you. Expecting to be peeled off her dirty sock, you instead heard your aunt's voice speak down in surprise, "Oh, there you are Hunter! Giving my foot a big ole' hug after the jogs over, huh?"

Norah bit her lip and felt her thighs squeeze together as her mind started to wander with the silence of the room. "You know, it's just you and me now...I bet you're just dying to be of use to your favorite person in all sorts of ways" Norah spoke out softly and with a sultry touch as she wiggled herself into the couch. You tried to shout out "NO!" but only got a mouthful of sock fuzz in the process. Norah released a light moan as you pressed right up against a sore spot on her sole and decide, "Alright, fine, you can stay there for a little while longer. I had a lot more fun stuff to experiment with you lined up but this should be fine while I rest up. Whaddya say you give me some more massaging as thanks for being such a good owner?"

Hearing Norah call herself your owner sent a blood chilling shudder through your body. Sure that's what she legally was and you knew that, but hearing the powerful title slip from her plush lips made your heart sink into your stomach. Feeling your body lift into the air, Norah moved her feet to rest on her living room ottoman and you heard the garble of the TV being flipped on.

The last thing you wanted to do was give this misunderstanding broad what she wanted, but you needed to push yourself free from her foot before you could get to work on reforming. Pushing your arms and legs as best as you could against the sole, Norah cooed in satisfaction, unable to stop herself from closing her eyes in bliss. Ignoring her pleased expressions, you kept at prying yourself further and further. As time went on you had to deal with Norah's playful other foot mindlessly rubbing against you, a simple and subconscious act for Norah that spelt disaster for you, but you pressed on.

It took the better part of an hour but you finally felt your body popping loose from all the damage Norah had done with her light jog. This time, Norah's other foot actually helped you as it caught the gap between you and her sock and ripped you free. Plopping down a carbon mold the shape of Norah's foot, toes and all, you went to work prying your limbs free and coming back to your human form.

Standing back at your mighty one inch form, you took in your surroundings to make a plan, only to see that Norah was fast asleep! Her legs were outstretched towards you of course, her tall and menacingly powerful feet still stood right next to you, their wicked stench still lingering all over. You wanted to give Norah the benefit of the doubt and blame the smell on her shoes or maybe her well-worn out socks, but with her tendencies and your history, you sighed in remorse.

You called out to Norah as well as you could but she didn't have the slightest reaction. You considered shoving or punching at her foot but you figured that was asking to get smeared under her heel if she perceived it as an "itch". Your only real option seemed to be to make your way on up to her face and see if you could wake her up with your shouts from there.

You gulped as you looked at the long fall to the floor. Scaling this ottoman down didn't seem feasible. That left one real option. Crawling your way up her ankle, you stood atop her shin and looked across her bare legs at the long bridge before you. One step at a time, you journeyed over the gap between the couch and her footrest, Norah's smooth and supple skin being no help in preventing you from falling. You only prayed she didn't move in her sleep, or even wake up and stand.

With your caution to thank, you made it past Norah's knees only to reach a newly ominous sight. Your sleeping aunt's legs were crossed together, her broad and thick thighs pouring over each other as they squished their juicy flesh into one another. You saw beads of sweat pooling together only to roll down and plop on her floor. Gulping at the challenge ahead, not only was it dangerous, but it also led to the intimidatingly embarrassing region of her crotch.

Hearing Norah's tired murmurs ahead, you just hoped you'd make it to Norah's face okay...

1153211223313.content:
“…my hairband.” The smile that slipped onto Norah’s face with that comment was apologetic, though not for the reasons you may have hoped. “I know it’s probably a bit tame for you but I promise it will just be temporary. Give me some time to think and I’ll come up with something much better.” She bit her lip at that, her eyes twinkling with a combination of child-like joy and a deep-seated desire to make you hers. “Ah, but, you did select accessory as a favourite as well, so hopefully this will be fun for you anyway. I know I’ll enjoy just having you with me and knowing you’re mine.”

This was bad. Really bad. The gentle and affection smile on your aunt’s face made you want to cry out in frustration as her warm hands continued to run across your body, kneading and stretching as she continued to chew at her lip. You knew that if you could just make her understand that you hated this, that you didn’t want to be used, that she would stop. That she loved you enough not to take advantage of Isabella’s cruelty. But you also knew that even if you could speak to her, with the way your luck usually ran she would likely misunderstand. So many times in the past you had been mistaken as a willing little man ready to serve her needs. By now, the idea of her nephew as a boy who would do anything to help her was firmly planted in Norah’s subconscious. A self-reinforcing belief that would have readily seen you used by her even without your new permanent licence.

Though you were glad that your initial use would be as something less intense that you had feared, you knew that it was only the prelude for what was to come. Already the blush on the redhead’s face was intense enough that it was reaching her ears, and her breath was coming out in short hot pants as she raised you to her face, bathing you in warmth. You shuddered at what may come as you tried to speak, but already Norah’s fingers were at work on your body, and you didn’t even have the chance to make a peep before her thumb blurred your mouth into uselessness. Grasping hands were slick with nervous sweat as they grasped your limbs and pulled, stretching you out before beginning to twist your arms and legs together as a single mass. The thumb descended once more, and what was left of your face was pushed down into your chest, smoothing out your features until it was no longer clear which end was which, only your eyes remaining intact enough to provide a tiny clue.

As she worked, Norah began to speak again, her voice hushed and intended for you alone. “It must have taken a lot of bravery to be so honest with what you wanted Hunter. I’m so proud of you.” She sighed, a self-deprecating sound. “I’ve been such a coward. Even though you were always so helpful to me, I could never admit that I… that I have always been interested in you. Not just as my darling little nephew, but as a tiny man who has done so much for me and who I… who I just wanted to have all to myself.” She sucked her lower lip for a moment, leaving it slightly red as her dexterous fingers began to twist and pinch your body into a more cylindrical form. “Every time you agreed to take on one of my jobs I couldn’t help but think that I didn’t want to share you. That you were just for me.”

All of Norah’s fingers were working together now, pulling and stretching to form you into a broader circle as she continued to spill her heart to her ‘willing’ nephew. “I always told myself that I mustn’t. That family was more important than whatever my base instincts might be telling me to do. Even if part of me always knew you wanted it as well.” She smiled again, soft and loving and chilling you to the bone. “There were so many times when I would find you beneath me, or stuck to something of mine, or replacing something of mine. So many ‘accidents’.” She chuckled. “I was such a fool.”

You could well remember many of those so-called ‘jobs’ Norah had sent you on, and had you been given the option back then to go on the job or just stay with your aunt, you would have picked the redhead in an instant. But, you had never realised back then that these kinds of thoughts were being directed towards you, and now you wondered just what could have happened to you back then if things had gone differently. You rapidly began to review years of past discussions, wondering just where you had gone wrong to generate the lingering basis of such an ingrained delusion. Was this the result of Tracy’s actions from back then? Or had these thoughts been there from the start?

You tried to wriggle, to pass on some kind of message at least, but Norah was already pulling her hair back into a loose bun with one hand, as the other brought you closer and she placed a single lingering kiss on your stretched-out form. The remains of your face and half your chest where pressed into the pillowy mass of the redhead’s lips as a blast of warm air washed over you from a single shaky breath. Then you were moving again as you were brought around behind your new owner and slipped around the waiting bun, your last view of the outside world being a bird’s eye view of the bulbous booty below before you snapped into place and everything went dark.

This wasn’t the first time Norah had used her cute nephew as an object, knowingly or otherwise, but this time she felt a pleasant chill run up her spine as she let go and confined you to her hair. Before it had always been a temporary thing. Even when you had agreed to days or weeks of use there had always been a time limit to dread. Now though, there was no longer any need to hold back. More than that, there was a legal imperative for her to act. To not use you would be to violate your rights in accordance with Baker’s Law. To deny you the right to be what you wanted to be. Before, a misguided sense of propriety had held her back. Now better informed, it compelled her to act.

“I’m sorry you had to go so far as to get this licence to make me see Hunter.” Hands now free, your aunt retrieved the licence from her pocket and ran her thumb across it with a sense of reverence, pausing as the digit came to rest on your own tiny card embedded in her own. “But I promise, from now on I’m going to do everything you want me to do. You’ll come with me everywhere, be with me always, and I’ll use you for everything I can.” Hazel eyes ran down the seemingly endless list once more as warmth filled her at just how much you wanted to be with her. “I swear, we won’t miss a single thing on this list. Even if it takes the rest of my years, I’ll make you as happy as I can.”

You tried desperately to respond, but even as you managed to produce a slight vibration you knew it was hopeless. The cushioning layer of your aunt’s hair rendered such slight movements meaningless, and even had she felt them she would likely have thought you were trembling in joy. Every word she spoke drove you further into despair as you realised there may never again come a time when someone would treat you as an actual person. That as far as the rest of the world, and the law, was concerned, you were Norah’s property now. An object to be used as she saw fit. Even her kind words did nothing to lift your spirits, knowing her fundamental misunderstandings would turn that goodwill against you. The last words spoken by your aunt as she moved to leave was a gentle “I love you” that made you want to cry. After all, the one thing that wasn’t on that list was a request to be human.

Isabella raised her head as your aunt stepped back into her office, suppressing a smirk at the blush still colouring the older woman’s face and the fact that you were nowhere to be seen. “All set? Already putting the little guy to good use?” In response, the redhead turned her head slightly to show off her hair, indicating your location with a shy smile. The corrupt licensing officer was a bit disappointed with such a tame use but smiled slyly as Norah went on to explain that she was keeping you there while she made plans for the future, and that you would get much more use later. To your aunt, it was confirmation that she would follow the law. To Isabella it was music to her ears.

It would forever surprise you how people could smile so maliciously without being suspected of ill-content. “We’ll send out a notification to anyone who received a copy of the previous general licence to let them know of the change. Just so there won’t be any trouble.” Or, more accurately, to make sure that there was no way you could weasel out of this. Isabella motioned to Norah like she was going to share some deep secret, before speaking again in a more conspiratorial tone. “If you ask me, you’ve got a great one there. I was a bit worried about him wanting to select everything like that, but he was adamant that you were deserving of his everything. I talked him into accepting a general licence temporarily while he thought about it overnight, but his conviction hadn’t changed.” It took all her self-control to keep from laughing as your aunt’s face lit up with obvious glee.

You wished you had the strength to kill Isabella in that moment, wondering what kind of monster could do this to someone just for having the gall to call her and her friend on their obvious lies. Her behaviour seemed so practiced. So assured. Who else had she doomed to this fate? How many of the Baker’s Law tinies in these parts were begging for release as they suffered at the hands of their misled tormentors? While you screamed inside, in the world beyond the women were all smiles as they parted, though Norah’s face was still burning red as she stepped outside and took a deep breath. A shaking hand raised to lay against her chest and feel the rapid beat of her heart as she smiled softly and thought of you, and just how much you had gone through to make sure she was happy. To make sure both of you were. The joyous laugh that escaped her then was one of a woman who had found her purpose in life, and there was a skip to her steps as she headed…
1153211223313.title: Tied Up with Norah

choices: Morgan finds a license loophole, and has your time reduced. How's Norah react?
Avery takes Norah up on her offer, but can you speak to her?
11532112233132.content:
You felt the strong inertia of jogging as your new owner bounded down the road somewhere. If only you weren't sealed to this redhead's hair with your face on the inside, you'd have some idea where you were headed but unfortunately you could only wonder. You gulped, if your aunt was headed straight home that would make her and Isabella the only people on the planet who knew you were legally chained to being Norah's property. Of course Isabella had to cover her tracks and notify everyone of the cancellation of your general use license, now not even your family would think anything of it besides it being a simple paperwork mistake. You could only pray that Norah would be as loud and forthcoming as possible with your family to reveal to them you were in this predicament...that is if they even questioned it.

Shaking the horrifying thought from your mind you heard Norah's cheery voice call out, "Oh hey Hunter, let's make a stop at your old apartment; I'd hate for your roommates to wait up when you won't be needing the space anymore!" Norah giggled to herself as she noted how little space you took up anyway. Still, she wanted to tie up any loose ends she could for you, to make sure there were as few interruptions as possible in fulfilling all of your deep, dark desires. It would be nice to get some more congratulations on her sort of...union as well. A bright red blush filled Norah's cheeks as she thought of how good that sounded to hear you two tied together. With a perky pace, Norah hurried towards your old domicile; wanting to get home both before dark and as soon as possible to have more time with you.

You cheered mentally as you heard Norah's mention of seeing your roommates. With how things went this morning, you knew for sure they'd be able to clear things up. You finally felt a glimmer of hope return to your mind as you imagined responsible Morgan tearing you from your overly attached aunt and letting you feel like a human again. You felt the hair around you grow a bit damp from Norah working up a good sweat on her run, and you winced praying that moment would come as soon as possible.

Finally reaching the steps of the apartment, Norah was panting hard and dripping on the doormat of your(former) apartment. Knocking, Norah waited for a moment before the shining face of Avery filled the frame as she opened the door. "Norah! Welcome back!" Avery was as warm and welcoming as ever despite the fact she had just met Norah that morning.

Norah, despite her fatigue, returned a bright smile and responded, "Ahhh, Avery! Short shift today? I was worried no one would be home and I'd have to leave a note." You winced imagining your very fate laying in the hands of a flimsy scrap-paper-note left on your door. A strong gust of wind would've been the difference between years of serving Norah or a bright future.

"Oh yea, nothing too much today. You look exhausted! Why don't you come in and get some water?" Norah graciously accepted and stepped in, following Avery to the kitchen with you bouncing along behind her. "You really worked up quite the sweat, you'll have to show me your routine some day!" Of course these two scatter-brains were getting along swimmingly as they made small talk about yoga and cardio. As Norah caught her breath and re-hydrated, you felt a tug against your leg as Norah grasped at you.

"Oh yeah, we can totally do a session someday! I bet yoga could be an amazing help in your modeling with enough effort!" As Norah spoke she was casually pulling you wider and wider until you went from a band to a wide flat square. Running you along her arms and chest to lap at her dripping perspiration, Norah was continuing to chatter on as Avery interrupted, "Woah, wasn't that your hairband a second ago? What is that, some new MicroFlex tech?"

Norah nervously giggled, that familiar blush returning to her face as she withdrew her usage license with one hand while getting to rubbing you along her waist methodically with her other. Presenting it proudly to Avery, Avery's jaw dropped in shock as she read the tiny print. "Oh. My. God. You didn't!" Hearing Avery's reaction made you sigh in relief even while getting a mouthful of Norah sweat. Wouldn't be long now until this was all straightened out...

"That is amazing! I'm so happy for you two! It's so rare a tiny finds someone they're willing to sign themselves over to. And woah, forever at that!" Easily excitable Avery wasn't even beginning to think that maybe this was some misunderstanding as she leapt at Norah, enveloping her in a great big hug despite Norah's current soaked state. The girls were giddily jumping in each other's embrace, all while you were mushed between them getting flatter by the second as their overwhelmingly bountiful chests smothered you constantly.

Interrupting their mini party, Morgan and Quinn arrived home from work and walked in on their embrace in the kitchen. "Woah, what's going on in here? And who's this?" Quinn asked plainly but with a genuine curiosity.

Finally breaking from her hug, Avery introduced Norah and she happily showed off her new usage license. While Norah peeled you off her chest sheepishly, Morgan and Quinn's jaws dropped but this time for the actual right reasons. Collecting their thoughts, the girls made their way to the living room where Norah was getting a bit more comfortable taking her shoes off and plopping on the couch. Morgan was the first to get to business as she sympathetically had her eyes locked on to your flat form laying in Norah's lap. "I really think there must be some kind of misunderstanding...Hunter straight up fainted when I told him he had a license this morning."

Norah merely laughed aloud at the idea of that, she imagined your large smile before toppling over in bliss thinking of her. "Fainted in excitement of course! You girls really don't know my nephew like I do, he's a quirky little guy like that!" Norah gave you an affectionate squeeze before she continued, "I mean really, he's been working up to this his whole life!" Norah had begun sliding you down her smooth thighs and calves before coming to her damp, not to mention sweltering, socked feet.

"I don't think that could possibly be true, he just signed up to move in here after all. He told us all about all these plans he had for the future!" Quinn stated, actually getting into this seeing as how wrong she thought your aunt was. Norah had begun pressing you firmly into the sole of each foot, forcing you to get a face-full of sweaty fabric that would've dripped onto the carpet if not for your body's desire to soak it all up.

"No, really! Ever since he was little he was always disguising himself as all sorts of useful little objects he somehow knew I needed, or magically getting himself stepped on or sat on. He really was like a little magnet for his favorite auntie!" Norah affectionately rubbed you deeper into her foot before satisfied with her work at drying her feet. Standing, she turned around and laid you flat on the couch before presenting her rotund booty to you. You watched her black spandex shorts stretch to their limit as Norah's ass widened as she sat. You shook feebly as it descended like a meteor onto your helpless body with a 'Whump!'. Norah bounced in place a bit saying, "Sorry, I really shouldn't have sat my sweaty behind on your nice couch, but don't worry, Hunter will help us out!" You screamed into an endless abyss that never produced a single sound at both Norah's words and her noxious tasting ass sweat that was seeping from her shorts onto you.

Quinn and Morgan exchanged nervous glances watching you while Avery nodded along approvingly. Truly Avery had no idea why her sisters were acting so investigative. Hunter signed the paperwork, what's their deal? Morgan spoke up again, "Really, Miss, I think this is all some big misunderstanding..." But Norah was quick to cut her off.

"Honey, I have dozens or maybe even hundreds of stories that would blow your mind! I'm not surprised you're a little confused but trust me when I say I just want what's best for him!" She felt a tiny itch in her ass and smeared it away with a wiggle on you before continuing, "Seriously, there was a time when he was little where he snuck into my dang suitcase masquerading as some kind of funny little rag!" Norah bellowed in laughter and fond remembrance shaking you beneath her, "He's sneaky too! I was none the wiser for quite a while, giving him more than enough use! I can't remember exactly how or why he eventually revealed himself but I'm sure he was as sad as I was!"

It seems you and Tracy never backtracking with Aunt Norah about her childhood tricks was really coming back to bite you. You swore if you ever got out of this you'd set the record straight. At this point Quinn and Morgan were feeling defeated and Quinn made one last plea, "If that's the case, why don't we just talk and ask him what he think-"

"Oh my is it getting dark out already! Yikes, I'd better get going girls! Thanks so much for taking care of Hunter for a bit but he's my responsibility now! I hope to see you girls around, maybe we could do that yoga sesh Avery?" Norah had peeled you from the couch and was out the door before Quinn could finish her thought or Morgan could protest. You swung in her grip as she took off jogging home. "Don't worry, Hunter. I know you. I won't let anyone take you from me." A chill ran down both your spines but for entirely different reasons. You just prayed your roommates wouldn't give up.

"It's okay Morgan, we'll figure something out..." Quinn patted a dejected Morgan on the back as they watched her run off. Morgan was wholly unconvinced. She saw that forged signature this morning and knew something was amiss.

Norah made good on her promises, using you as a shower wash cloth and couch cushion before getting to bed with you tucked deep in her warm and cozy yet suffocating cleavage. Eventually...

That image sent shivers down your spine, and you hoped that ignoring it would keep her ‘playfulness’ at bay.

115333.content:
Given your tiny size, you'd dodged your fair share of giant feet in your life, though running on sand certainly made it harder. As soon as her shadow passed over your body, you dived forward with everything you had.

THOOM

The crash of her foot hitting the sand right next to you rattled your eardrums, but that's all. With another bounding step she was gone, leaving you watching her bouncing ass as she strode to the volleyball court. Still, the volleyball girls were far too busy to try and talk to, and they didn't seem to need any help. With a sigh, you continued down the beach, keeping an eye out for those in need of assistance.

Before long, you came to a giant brunette woman laying on her stomach on a beach towel. She looked about your age. Her bronzed skin contrasted sharply with the hot pink color of her bikini. Her bikini bottoms at least seemed to have their work cut out for them, barely containing her large rump. You walked up in front of her face, though her dark brown eyes seemed distracted by her cell phone at the moment, and she didn't see you.

"Hello miss, can I be of any assistance?" You asked, trying to sound more confident than you were.

The giantess looked up from her cell phone, surprised by your voice. When she saw your tiny body standing in front of her, hands on your hips, she couldn't help but giggle. "And who might you be little guy?" She asked, putting her phone down on the towel.

"My name is Hunter, and I'm a newly hired lifeguard." This seemed to be going well so far.

"Well Hunter, my name is Dana, and you caught me at a perfect time. I do have a bit of a situation and I could really use some help."

"Of course! Whatever you need!" You were thrilled that you found someone who needed your help, and couldn't accept fast enough. Your job was on the line after all.

"Great! I'm so glad, it's very lucky you came along. You're the perfect size for what I have in mind!"

You were a little caught off guard by that. Your tiny size usually caused problems for you, so it was pretty surprising that she thought it would actually help.

"Oh really? What exactly do you need?"

Dana smiled and reached down and picked you up off the sand, bringing you towards her face. She smiled as she whispered her answer to you:

1. "I've got a bunch of sand in my ass and it's driving my crazy, I was hoping you could handle it." Dana lays on her stomach and slides you into her bikini bottom, demanding that you clean all the sand out of her butt.

2. "It's too hot today, I could use a sweat rag for my tits." Before you can object, she smushes you flat and uses you to mop the sweat off of her breasts before tossing you aside and returning to tanning.

3. "I'm starving, and I think you'll hit the spot." Dana shoves you into her mouth and starts to chew on your gummy body. Will Quinn notice?

info.brief_description: You, one inch tall college graduate, accidentally move in with three normal sized girls.
info.description:
(Inspired by and set in the world of A Shrunken College Student - https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/2178043-A-Shrunken-Colleg...)

Backstory (written by Hectic)

A lot has changed in the past 25 years since the great shrinking epidemic swept across the world. In an event that some called a medical mystery and others called an act of god, a type of shrinking virus spread to every corner of the earth, affecting part of the population while leaving another part completely fine. Those who fell victim to this virus rapidly shrunk down to one inch tall, but at the same time gained a strange durability and malleability that has baffled scientists and doctors alike. However, the tiny people were not ones to complain about these newfound characteristics, as they were the only things preventing their lives from being taken by a stray step or anything else of that nature. The third most interesting aspect about this inexplicable shrinking is the fact that only men seem to have suffered from it, with women across the world remaining completely unaffected.

From the first day of the shrinking event it was expected that society would change drastically, and while it definitely did, surprisingly much of it remained the same. There was no evil women’s takeover or forced servitude of the now smaller men. For the most part, many men who had a job that did not require physical labor of any kind were able to continue living somewhat normal lives. Certain laws were put into place which prevented too much malicious behavior from befalling the tiny men, but these were really only enforced when a woman would purposefully try to kill, kidnap, or otherwise torture them. The vast majority of the time women would get away with any accidents between them and the tiny guys with a small slap on the wrists.

Your Story

It's been 25 years since the shrinking pandemic, and the world has fallen into a pretty standard cycle once more. People have (more-or-less) adapted to the drastic changes in daily life, and the abnormal has become routine. You were born tiny, and have lived your whole life at the measly size of one inch. Life's been rough sometimes, but you're still alive and kicking. You've just graduated from Wentworth University after four years of college life, and have no idea what to do next. Searching for a cheap apartment online, you found a spacious offering in a suburban community called "Sanderson", with a deal to spilt the rent four ways, with three other people. Agreeing to these awesome terms, you got caught up in your excitement and forgot to click the "Apartments for Tinies Only" button.

Oops.

Main Characters

Hunter Woods (You) - The main character, and 21 years old. You have tanned skin, and are decently muscular due to how often you find yourself climbing/lifting things. You've got a head of sandy brown hair and similarly brown eyes, and you tend to consider yourself fairly attractive. You're good at a lot of things, but never settled on a specific career path and instead went with a basic degree in Communications (how cliché). You tend to be pretty outgoing and extroverted, which can get you into trouble from time to time. You aren't sure of what your future holds for you, but you're open to all possibilities. You can also be slightly perverted, but not in a truly creepy way.

Morgan Sinclair - One of your new roommates, and 22 years old. She has dark tanned skin, long and wavy chocolate brown hair worn straight down, and hazel eyes. She stands at 6'0", and her presence can be a bit intimidating due to her height and her toned, decently muscular body. This, however, is a complete disservice to her personality. Morgan is energetic, friendly, compassionate, and has a good sense of humor. She's willing to help out anyone in need, at any time. She just so happens to also love exercising and playing sports, which has lent itself to her tanned skin and toned physique. It's hard to ignore her physical charms too, as her sizable, firm curves are incredible.

Morgan has just landed a job as an employee at the local gym, "Workout World", where she is assigned to help patrons in need, clean up used equipment and the like, and occasionally teach weekly yoga classes. In her spare time, Morgan exercises constantly, and has joined up with the Sanderson community basketball team that plays matches down at the local park. She makes friends easily, and isn't above teasing those closest to her. People can always turn to her for camaraderie and support.

Avery Sinclair - One of your new roommates, and 22 years old. She is Morgan's twin sister, though the similarities mostly stop there. While she has the same dark tanned skin tone, her hair is dyed with streaks of bright pink, and often worn in a ponytail. She's a fair bit shorter, standing at 5'8", though still miles taller than someone like you. Avery possesses Morgan's positive traits, but dialed up to eleven. She's extremely happy-go-lucky, bouncy, and carefree. Prone to fits of laughter and huge smiles, Avery brightens the day of everyone she comes into contact with. She's blessed with the same bountiful body as Morgan, but due to a little less exercise, her curvy chest and butt are a bit heftier and jigglier than her sister.

Avery recently scored a well-paying gig as a model at a local photo agency, "Starlight Studios", which has always been a dream of hers. Smiling for the camera while clad in some of the most scandalous and revealing outfits imaginable is nothing to a girl with so much body positivity. This confidence bleeds over into her social life, as Avery can come off as overly affectionate and flirtatious from time-to-time, along with being a bit of a prankster. On top of this, Avery is frequently teased by Morgan for being scatterbrained and oblivious, often at the worst possible times. Avery doesn't let this get her down (and by extension, doesn't try to fix her airheaded tendencies). Heaven forbid someone gives her any alcohol. She is also openly bi-sexual.

Quinn Wallace - One of your new roommates, and 23 years old. Quinn has paler, smooth and milky skin in comparison to the Sinclair sisters, and her dark black hair is cut in a short bob, bangs covering one of Quinn's piercing blue eyes. Quinn is a tad shorter than Morgan, standing at 5'10", and her demeanor frequently turns people off from her. Quinn is soft-spoken and reserved, with a seemingly apathetic attitude towards life. When she does speak, it's usually biting sarcasm. In reality, Quinn just doesn't know how to fully open up and express herself, and doesn't mean to push others away. Ironically, Quinn still draws in so many people wanting to know her, and for a reason completely out of her control: her body. Quinn won the genetic lottery, and is a very curvaceous young woman in all respects. She thinks of herself as "fat", but most people would call her "thicc".

Quinn applied for a job on a whim in an attempt to get outside more often, and was actually hired. As such, she's the newest lifeguard working at "Sanderson Beach", tasked with looking over the beach and helping any one in need. She hasn't had to actually rescue anyone yet, and always lathers up with veritable buckets of sunscreen to keep her pale skin safe in the heat of the day. It takes her a long time to open up to other people, and she can be standoffish until she fully trusts someone. She shares some of Avery's obliviousness, but half the time it is because nothing really bothers her enough for her to take notice. If it involves tinies, she'll often treat them in a manner akin to "tough love".

Minor Characters

Tracy Woods - Your younger sister by one year, making her 20 years old. She's got your same nicely tanned skin tone and sandy brown hair, though she wears her hair long and braided. She also has the same pleasant brown eye color as you. Compared to most girls that fate cruelly threw you in the path of all during your life, Tracy's always been on the tamer side of things in the looks department. She stands at 5'6", and possess a lithe and lean build. Her curves are much more subdued than the other giantesses in your life, but Tracy is no less beautiful. Of course, she's your sister, so you never viewed her in any weird way.

Though she's one of your best friends in the present day, Tracy could be a little bit of a menace when she was younger. From the time Tracy was in sixth grade up until around eleventh grade, she grew a nasty persecution complex, wrongfully believing that you more loved and cared about than she was. This perceived mistreatment spiraled into full-on jealousy, and Tracy began going out of her way to treat you in a mean-spirited manner. Sometimes she'd act callously towards you, sometimes she'd pull some mean or degrading pranks on you (frequently involving other family members without their knowledge), but on truly awful days, Tracy could be a nightmare. She's since apologized profusely for her younger days, but whenever you think back on them you shudder. Tracy is currently a photographer and reporter for a local newspaper, with ambitions to reach a higher position one day.

Helen Woods - Your mother, who has just recently turned 40. Even reaching the mid-point of her life, Helen has not let her age hamper her good looks. Still quite stunning, Helen has your family's shared tanned skin and sandy brown hair, but she styles and crops her hair to frame her face and fall to her shoulders. Her eyes are a piercing blue color, a stark difference from you and your sister. Perhaps most prominently, Helen is a fairly endowed woman in the chest department, and her derriere is similarly developed. She's put on a bit of weight over the years of busy office work, but that weight seems to feed into all the right places.

Striking the perfect balance between compassion and punishment, Helen was the dictionary definition of a strict but fair mother. If you or Tracy acted up, she'd mete out due retribution. If you and Tracy were on good behavior, she'd kiss you goodnight and make breakfast for you the next morning. Contrary to what Tracy believed for years, she treated you no differently despite your tiny size, expecting the same effort from you in all your daily endeavors that she would from a normal person. Maintaining a high-paying job as an international correspondent for a famous tech company, Helen was frequently away on business trips during your childhood, leaving you alone and at Tracy's mercy (or sometimes Helen's sister, and your aunt, Norah).

Aunt Norah - Your mother's older sister, who is 42 years old. Norah lived a few hours away from your childhood home, but due to the nature of her job, she worked from home with a comfortable salary. As such, she could drop everything at a moment's notice to babysit you and Tracy whenever your mom left on one of her frequent business trips. Good looks run all throughout the female members in your family, and Norah is no different. She has tanned skin, medium-length hair usually in a bun (and dyed a soft red color), and hazel eyes. She's a fairly curvaceous woman, but she keeps her developed body toned through daily yoga sessions.

Norah's a fun-loving and energetic aunt, but often in a bad way for a tiny like yourself. For one, Norah never considers the consequences of her actions. If Norah accidentally squishes you, you'll get a sheepish wince and a quick apology from her, and then Norah will forget all about the incident entirely. It's like she has a hard time realizing how difficult daily trials are for a tiny like yourself. She also barely punished Tracy for bullying you back in the day, if Norah happens to notice at all. Notoriously airheaded and frequently forgetful, Norah was Tracy's favorite target to humiliate and torment you with in the past. Norah's job as a tiny recruiter didn't help either. Paid a sizable salary for finding willing tinies for occasionally unsavory jobs, Norah's earnest attitude had a way of roping you into some dangerous jobs on last minute notices. You love her as family, but she's a handful when she's around.

Becky Wallace - Quinn's mother, and a 42 year old woman. One look at Becky, either in person or through a photograph, is enough to clue anybody into where Quinn got her impressive curves from. Somehow, Becky is even thicker and more developed than her daughter, sporting an hourglass body women around the world would kill for. She has black hair, like her daughter, but she keeps hers long and cascading down her back. She has fair, milky smooth skin and blue eyes. Her measurements are off the charts in all departments, from her perfectly perky chest to her prodigious posterior. She's seemingly oblivious to her overflowing sex appeal, and is blissfully unaware of what people mean when they refer to her as a "milf" on her social media comments.

Towards Quinn, Becky is as motherly as anyone ever has been before. Devoted and doting to a fault, Becky can come across as clingy due to how lovingly she treats Quinn (who she refers to as her "sweet angel" and "Quinnie"). Becky is a fun-loving gal always willing to try new things and spoil her only child. However, add a tiny to the equation, and Becky's personality 180s. Whereas she treats all girls (and normal sized guys) with respect, she possess a monumental loathing for tinies. Distasteful of them, she finds tinies nothing more than pests at best, and gross bugs at worst. She won't hesitate to do what she has to do to take care of any tinies she's deemed a nuisance. This includes removing all tinies from contact with her daughter, as she believes them to be beneath her and unworthy of associating with normal people.

Lilyana and Mariah Sinclair - The mothers of Morgan and Avery, a lovingly bi-sexual couple, and both 40 years of age. They both have a habit of being filled with optimism and energy, brightening up any situation with their happiness. The couple met in high school, and dated for a few years before marrying. Lilyana was a Russian exchange student, and she still possesses a slight, adorable accent. Her skin is nearly porcelain white and silky smooth, and her blonde hair is so bright its practically sheer white in color. She has an elegant appearance, less curvaceous than other women, but tall and shapely, like a fashion model. Mariah is half-Hispanic, and has the chocolate brown hair that was passed onto their twins (to clarify, Mariah is the one who gave birth to the twins after utilizing a sperm donor). Mariah has a good deal more weight on her than Lilyana, but in all the right places. She frequently draws eyes with her hourglass figure.

Lilyana is a professional celebration organizer, or "party planner". She knows how to have a good time, and knows how to help others do the same. Not a week passes by where she isn't helping to set up birthday parties, bachelorette hangouts, and extravagant weddings. Mariah is the proud owner of a small local burger restaurant called "Sinclair Sandwiches". It isn't much, but it turns a profit. Mariah spends most of her time as the head chef in the kitchen, whipping up delicious meals to her valued customers (and sampling quite a bit of the food herself). The two women are as in love with each other as the day they first began dating, and they flirt incessantly. Lilyana finds tinies to be curious and fascinating, and Mariah thinks tinies are adorable little things that just beg to be played with. Though they aren't meanspirited by any stretch of the imagination, neither woman truly views tinies as real human beings, but more like cute pets.

More to be added in the future!

Quick Rules

This story is written in second person (you, your, etc.) Please keep it that way. However, if you want to write a bit from someone else's perspective, third person can work for that when needed.

Hunter cannot die. He can only be squished, squashed, flattened, stretched, and anything else you think of. He will reform in time, given the chance to do so. Keep the story going!

Try not to write chapters that are exceptionally short. A bridge chapter from time to time is just fine, but too many and the story starts feeling weak.

Lastly, avoid heavily sexual/insertion content and any giant male content. Basically, just don't introduce any other guys into the story, UNLESS they too are tiny. That could be interesting (just make sure Hunter is always the main character). Everything else goes.

Read, add, and enjoy!
